A fast and thrilling mix tape with energising songs with break-neck beats.
  • Increases the Detection radius of Killer Instinct by +20 metres.
  • Unlocks an additional sound layer in your Terror Radius, enhancing it musically.

Susie's Mix Tape can be combined with any other Mix Tape Add-on to unlock multiple sound layer combos.
Susie's_Mix_Tape.name: Susie's Mix Tape

The_Legion_Pin.description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion.
To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
  • Survivors suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds after mending themselves.
The_Legion_Pin.name: The Legion Pin

Bloodied_Mud.description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson.

The bloody layers empower the mud.

  • Reduces the Trigger range of Phantasm Traps by -30 %.
Bloodied_Mud.name: Bloodied Mud

Bloodied_Water.description:
Tainted water contained in a folded water lily leaf.
  • Reduces the Trigger range of Phantasm Traps by -20 %.
Bloodied_Water.name: Bloodied Water

Bog_Water.description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
  • Reduces the Trigger range of Phantasm Traps by -10 %.
Bog_Water.name: Bog Water

Cracked_Turtle_Egg.description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
  • Increases the Tripped duration of Phantasm Traps by +30 %.
Cracked_Turtle_Egg.name: Cracked Turtle Egg

Cypress_Necklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
  • Increases the Setting speed of Phantasm Traps by +15 %.
Cypress_Necklet.name: Cypress Necklet

Dead_Fly_Mud.description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies.
Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases the Teleport range to tripped Phantasm Traps by +10 %.
Dead_Fly_Mud.name: Dead Fly Mud

Disfigured_Ear.description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear.
Deformed due to several hits to the head.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power:
  • Survivors suffer from the Deafened Status Effect for 6 seconds after triggering a Phantasm Trap.
Disfigured_Ear.name: Disfigured Ear

Dragonfly_Wings.description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp.
Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases the Teleport range to tripped Phantasm Traps by +12.5 %.
Dragonfly_Wings.name: Dragonfly Wings

Dried_Cicada.description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash; crispy.
Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases the Teleport range to tripped Phantasm Traps by +15 %.
Dried_Cicada.name: Dried Cicada

Grandma's_Heart.description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

Whenever Survivors trigger Phantasm Traps, you benefit from the following effects for their tripped duration:

  • Suppresses your Terror Radius.
  • Doubles the range of the Fake Terror Radius emitted by the Mud Phantasms to 16 metres.
"Bring me another slice of the girl." — Grandma
Grandma's_Heart.name: Grandma's Heart

Half_Eggshell.description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
  • Increases the Tripped duration of Phantasm Traps by +25 %.
Half_Eggshell.name: Half Eggshell

Mint_Rag.description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Press the Active Ability button to teleport to any untripped Phantasm Trap anywhere in the environment.

Mint Rag has a cool-down of 10 seconds.
Mint_Rag.name: Mint Rag

Powdered_Eggshell.description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
  • Increases the Tripped duration of Phantasm Traps by +20 %.
Powdered_Eggshell.name: Powdered Eggshell

Pussy_Willow_Catkins.description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
  • The Auras of Survivors tripping Phantasm Traps are revealed to you for 3 seconds.
Pussy_Willow_Catkins.name: Pussy Willow Catkins

Rope_Necklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
  • Increases the Setting speed of Phantasm Traps by +10 %.
Rope_Necklet.name: Rope Necklet

Rusty_Shackles.description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Suppresses any indication to Survivors that they tripped Phantasm Traps.
  • Suppresses the creation of Mud Phantasms.
Rusty_Shackles.name: Rusty Shackles

Scarred_Hand.description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Grants collision with Survivors to both Phantasm Traps and the Mud Phantasms.
  • Grants +300 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
  • Disables your ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.

Scarred Hand trumps all other Add-ons.

"..." — The Butcher
Scarred_Hand.name: Scarred Hand

Swamp_Orchid_Necklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
  • Increases the Setting speed of Phantasm Traps by +20 %.
Swamp_Orchid_Necklet.name: Swamp Orchid Necklet

Waterlogged_Shoe.description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Increases your default Movement speed by +7.5 % to 4.73 m/s.
  • Survivors suffer from a -9 % Hindered Status Effect within the Trigger range of Phantasm Traps.
  • Disables your ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.
Waterlogged_Shoe.name: Waterlogged Shoe

Willow_Wreath.description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
  • The Auras of Survivors tripping Phantasm Traps are revealed to you for 5 seconds.
Willow_Wreath.name: Willow Wreath

Apex_Muffler.description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.
  • Silences the Chainsaw for all Survivors outside of the Terror Radius.
Apex_Muffler.name: Apex Muffler

Begrimed_Chains_(Chainsaw).description:
A foul yet oddly familiar chain, coated with something unpleasant.
  • Survivors hit with the Chainsaw suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds.
Begrimed_Chains_(Chainsaw).name: Begrimed Chains

Clogged_Intake.description:
Modifying the airflow is key to modifying the Chainsaw's power.
  • Extends the duration of Overdrive by +15 %.
Clogged_Intake.name: Clogged Intake

Counterweight.description:
Adds weight to the base, for stability.
  • Reduces the initial Turn rate of the Chainsaw during a Chainsaw Sprint by -70 %.
Counterweight.name: Counterweight

Cracked_Primer_Bulb.description:
A button that clears air from the fuel lines.
This machine needs to be fed.
  • Increases the Charge rate of the Overdrive Meter by +15 %.
  • Survivors hit with the Chainsaw are only damaged for a single Health State.
Cracked_Primer_Bulb.name: Cracked Primer Bulb

Dad's_Boots.description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Senior.
  • Increases the Turn speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +30 %.
Dad's_Boots.name: Dad's Boots

Discarded_Air_Filter.description:
A cracked and dusty filter.
It still manages to work better than the stock model.
  • Increases the Decay delay for the Overdrive Meter by +20 %.
Discarded_Air_Filter.name: Discarded Air Filter

Filthy_Slippers.description:
Max sometimes struggled to hear his mother's footfalls.
  • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect until you stop sprinting after maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for at least 2 seconds.
Filthy_Slippers.name: Filthy Slippers

Greased_Throttle.description:
A lubricated trigger.
One twitch of the finger brings the Chainsaw back to life.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after using the Chainsaw by -5 %, when not in Overdrive.
Greased_Throttle.name: Greased Throttle

High-Speed_Idler_Screw.description:
A loosened screw will bring more power to the Chainsaw
  • Increases the Decay delay for the Overdrive Meter by +30 %.
High-Speed_Idler_Screw.name: High-Speed Idler Screw

Iridescent_Engravings.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in The Fog.
Fills the user with determination.
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +20 %.
  • Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.
Iridescent_Engravings.name: Iridescent Engravings

LoPro_Chains.description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater manoeuvrability.
  • Grants the ability to continue a Chainsaw Sprint through Breakable Walls and dropped Pallets, breaking them in the process.
  • Healthy Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of triggering the primary effect are only damaged for a single Health State.
    • Injured Survivors will suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect instead.
LoPro_Chains.name: LoPro Chains

Low_Kickback_Chains.description:
A specialised chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -15 %.
Low_Kickback_Chains.name: Low Kickback Chains

Off-Brand_Motor_Oil.description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
  • Increases the Charge rate of the Overdrive Meter by +15 %.
Off-Brand_Motor_Oil.name: Off-Brand Motor Oil

Ragged_Engine.description:
Some would say it needs a tune-up.
Max would say it is tuned-up.
  • Reduces the Dissipation speed of the Overdrive Meter when not using the Chainsaw by -30 %.
Ragged_Engine.name: Ragged Engine

Spiked_Boots.description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow into mud for more stability and control with each step.
  • Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +30 %.
Spiked_Boots.name: Spiked Boots

Steel_Toe_Boots.description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -10 %.
Steel_Toe_Boots.name: Steel Toe Boots

The_Thompsons'_Mix.description:
A special oily substance used in the lubrication of all machinery concocted by the Thompsons themselves.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after using the Chainsaw by -10 %, when not in Overdrive.
The_Thompsons'_Mix.name: The Thompsons' Mix

Thermal_Casing.description:
A thicker case that allows the user to control the conservation of energy.
  • Reduces the Dissipation speed of the Overdrive Meter when not using the Chainsaw by -20 %.
Thermal_Casing.name: Thermal Casing

Tuned_Carburettor.description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburettor has been well adjusted.
  • Increases the Charge speed of the Chainsaw by +20 %.
  • Reduces your Movement speed to 4.4 m/s.
Tuned_Carburettor.name: Tuned Carburettor

Amanita_Toxin.description:
A toxin from the Amanita mushroom, applied to the Hatchet's blade.
It numbs the mind.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Amanita_Toxin.name: Amanita Toxin

Bandaged_Haft.description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchet's haft.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Hatchet throws by -10 %.
Bandaged_Haft.name: Bandaged Haft

Begrimed_Head.description:
This Hatchet head is stained with a foul substance that afflicts anyone who it touches with debilities.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds.
Begrimed_Head.name: Begrimed Head

Coarse_Stone.description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good.
A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.
  • Increases the volume of Grunts of Pain of injured Survivors hit by Hatchets by +50 %.
Coarse_Stone.name: Coarse Stone

Deerskin_Gloves.description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.
  • Reduces the Reload time of Hatchets at Lockersto 80 % of its default value.
Deerskin_Gloves.name: Deerskin Gloves

Flower_Babushka.description:
A clean and colourful handkerchief adorned with a flower pattern.
This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Reduces the Wind-up time of Hatchets by -0.1 seconds.
Flower_Babushka.name: Flower Babushka

Glowing_Concoction.description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets have their Aura revealed to you for 5 seconds.
Glowing_Concoction.name: Glowing Concoction

Infantry_Belt.description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier.
He was quick in combat, but she was quicker.
  • Successfully hitting a Survivor with a Hatchet grants a +3 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds.
Infantry_Belt.name: Infantry Belt

Iridescent_Head.description:
A glass-like Hatchet head moulded from The Fog itself.
The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets are automatically put into the Dying State.
  • Reduces the number of carried Hatchets to 1.
    • This number cannot be modified by other Add-ons.

"The iridescent glass cuts through flesh and soul."
Iridescent_Head.name: Iridescent Head

Leather_Loop.description:
The right tool in the right hands is key to a successful hunt.
  • Successfully hitting a Survivor with a Hatchet grants a +2 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds.
Leather_Loop.name: Leather Loop

Manna_Grass_Braid.description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass.
This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Reduces the Wind-up time of Hatchets by -8 %.
Manna_Grass_Braid.name: Manna Grass Braid

Oak_Haft.description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Hatchet throws by -20 %.
Oak_Haft.name: Oak Haft

Rose_Root.description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.
  • Increases the Projectile speed of Hatchets by +20 %.
Rose_Root.name: Rose Root

Rusty_Head.description:
This Hatchet head is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal from.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.
Rusty_Head.name: Rusty Head

Shiny_Pin.description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen.
Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.
  • Increases the Movement speed while winding Hatchets up by +5 %.
Shiny_Pin.name: Shiny Pin

Soldier's_Puttee.description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier.
It provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Huntress to 4.6 m/s while out of Hatchets.
Soldier's_Puttee.name: Soldier's Puttee

Venomous_Concoction.description:
A toxic concoction, applied to the Hatchet's blade.
The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus Snake venom, which gives it fatiguing capabilities.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.
Venomous_Concoction.name: Venomous Concoction

Weighted_Head.description:
An oddly weighted Hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target.
It requires a wielder with a strong arm.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Incapacitated Status Effect for 10 seconds.
Weighted_Head.name: Weighted Head

Wooden_Fox.description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches.
A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect after reloading at Lockers for 30 seconds.
Wooden_Fox.name: Wooden Fox

Yellowed_Cloth.description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.
  • Increases the Projectile speed of Hatchets by +10 %.
Yellowed_Cloth.name: Yellowed Cloth

Bottle_of_Chloroform.description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anaesthetic capabilities.
  • Increases the size and spread of the Intoxication Gas Clouds by +20 %.
Bottle_of_Chloroform.name: Bottle of Chloroform

Cheap_Gin_Bottle.description:
When the night is rough and the day is rougher, a little hair of the dog will give you a boost.
  • Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect from Invigoration by +3 % .
Cheap_Gin_Bottle.name: Cheap Gin Bottle

Cigar_Box.description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers.
Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
  • The Auras of all other Players within 16 metres of their location are revealed to Invigorated Players for 6 seconds.
Cigar_Box.name: Cigar Box

Ether_15_Vol%.description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
  • Increases the Intoxication duration by +1 second.
Ether_15_Vol%.name: Ether 15 Vol%

Fingerless_Parade_Gloves.description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel, the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
  • Increases the Throw speed of Bottles by +25 %.
  • Reduces the Throw angle of Bottles by -15 °.
Fingerless_Parade_Gloves.name: Fingerless Parade Gloves

Flask_of_Bleach.description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burns and lung damage.
  • Increases the strength of the Hindered Status Effect Survivors suffer from during Intoxication by an additional -4 %.
Flask_of_Bleach.name: Flask of Bleach

Garish_Make-Up_Kit.description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote.
The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effect.
  • Increases the Invigoration duration by +2 seconds.
Garish_Make-Up_Kit.name: Garish Make-Up Kit

Kerosene_Can.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
  • Survivors affected by Intoxication suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.
Kerosene_Can.name: Kerosene Can

Party_Bottle.description:
Be the life of the party!
  • Bottles emit confetti when they break in addition to their usual effects.
  • Hitting Survivors directly with a Bottle grants 100 bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Party_Bottle.name: Party Bottle

Redhead's_Pinkie_Finger.description:
The prized pinkie finger of a redhead.
Faintly fragrant.
Tastes of potpourri and varnish.
  • Survivors hit directly by Bottles suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they are affected by Intoxication.
  • Reduces the number of carried Bottles to 1.
    • This number cannot be modified by other Add-ons.
Redhead's_Pinkie_Finger.name: Redhead's Pinkie Finger

Robin_Feather.description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Bottle throws by -40 %.
Robin_Feather.name: Robin Feather

Smelly_Inner_Soles.description:
A mouldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
  • Increases your Movement speed while reloading Bottles by +66 %.
Smelly_Inner_Soles.name: Smelly Inner Soles

Solvent_Jug.description:
A chemical volatile compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of the Afterpiece Antidote.
  • Increases the Invigoration duration by +1 second.
Solvent_Jug.name: Solvent Jug

Spirit_of_Hartshorn.description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia.
One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
  • Increases the size and spread of the Invigoration Gas Clouds by +20 %.
Spirit_of_Hartshorn.name: Spirit of Hartshorn

Starling_Feather.description:
A black feather with an emerald gloss, very soft to the touch.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Bottle throws by -50 %.
Starling_Feather.name: Starling Feather

Sticky_Soda_Bottle.description:
It's sugary sweet, with only a little blood on the label.
  • Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect from Invigoration by +2 % .
Sticky_Soda_Bottle.name: Sticky Soda Bottle

Sulphuric_Acid_Vial.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
  • Survivors affected by Intoxication suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.
Sulphuric_Acid_Vial.name: Sulphuric Acid Vial

Tattoo's_Middle_Finger.description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man.
Has a faint taste of machinery oil.
  • The Auras of Survivors afflicted by either Intoxication or Invigoration are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
Tattoo's_Middle_Finger.name: Tattoo's Middle Finger

Thick_Cork_Stopper.description:
A sturdy cork fitting the Afterpiece Tonic Bottles marvellously.
  • Reduces the Reload time of the Bottles by -0.5 seconds.
Thick_Cork_Stopper.name: Thick Cork Stopper

VHS_Porn.description:
An all time classic.
You will not see things quite the same again.
  • Switches the colours of the Gas Clouds with one another.
VHS_Porn.name: VHS Porn

Battle_Axe_Head.description:
Sander Rault was a tower of a man, terrifying in form and demeanour.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after summoning The Carnifex by -20 %.
Battle_Axe_Head.name: Battle Axe Head

Blacksmith's_Hammer.description:
In their hands, everything was a weapon.
  • Causes Survivors damaged by a Guard during a Hunt to suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Blacksmith's_Hammer.name: Blacksmith's Hammer

Broken_Hilt.description:
A fresh weapon is clean, even surgical; an attack with a broken one is malicious and desperate.
  • Survivors damaged by a Guard suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds.
Broken_Hilt.name: Broken Hilt

Call_to_Arms.description:
Posted across many towns, lords desperate to protect their riches posted for able-bodied mercenaries. None survived.
  • Increases the maximum length of the Patrol Path by +10 metres.
  • Increases the Movement speed while drawing the Patrol Path by +2.2 m/s.
Call_to_Arms.name: Call to Arms

Cold_Steel_Manacles.description:
Alejandro Santiago apprenticed as an armourer and showed no remorse.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after summoning The Jailer by -20 %.
Cold_Steel_Manacles.name: Cold Steel Manacles

Dried_Horsemeat.description:
Long campaigns often required restocking, and the steeds of fallen enemies were as good as any farm-fresh ration.
  • Extends the duration of a Hunt by +4 seconds.
Dried_Horsemeat.name: Dried Horsemeat

Flint_and_Steel.description:
Attacks at night were not uncommon.
Fear was often their greatest ally.

Summoning The Carnifex has the following effect:

  • The Auras of all Survivors within 24 metres of unbroken Pallets are revealed to you for 8 seconds.
Flint_and_Steel.name: Flint and Steel

Grim_Iron_Mask.description:
No method of torture was too base for Guardia Compagnia.
Pain and humiliation went hand-in-hand.
  • Survivors detected by a Guard during the Patrol Phase suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 75 seconds.
Grim_Iron_Mask.name: Grim Iron Mask

Gritty_Lump.description:
A rock-hard, dense loaf filled their stomachs on most days, giving them the energy to commit truly heinous acts.
  • Increases the Movement Speed of Guards during the Patrol Phase by +9 %.
Gritty_Lump.name: Gritty Lump

Healing_Poultice.description:
Their reputation was so large, so horrible, that the mere knowledge that they were coming was enough to bring people to their knees.

Summoning The Assassin has the following effect:

  • The Auras of all Survivors within 8 metres of his Spawn location are revealed to you for 8 seconds.
Healing_Poultice.name: Healing Poultice

Iridescent_Company_Banner.description:
Where this banner was raised, those who called themselves 'civilised' ran and hid, because for all their codes and laws, they had nothing resembling actual strength.
  • Causes all Windows on the Patrol Path to be blocked to all Survivors for 25 seconds after summoning a Guard.
  • Causes all Windows vaulted by the Hunted Survivor to be blocked to all other Survivors for the duration of the Hunt.
  • Causes the Exit Gates to be blocked to the Hunted Survivor for the duration of the Hunt.

"They huddle in their villages like parasites! They have lost the drive for power." — Tarhos Kovács
Iridescent_Company_Banner.name: Iridescent Company Banner

Ironworker's_Tongs.description:
Vital for repairs between battles and a horrifying, gauging, tearing improvisational weapon.
  • Causes Survivors to suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds, if a Guard fails to damage them during a Hunt.
Ironworker's_Tongs.name: Ironworker's Tongs

Jailer's_Chimes.description:
Many captives met the same grisly end for attempting to escape his clutches.
  • The Auras of Survivors crossing the Patrol Path of The Jailer are revealed to you for 8 seconds.
Jailer's_Chimes.name: Jailer's Chimes

Knight's_Contract.description:
The original document contracting Tarhos to Vittorio's employ.
The laws of man could not stand up, though, to natural law.
  • Causes a Guard to linger around for 8 seconds after completing a Guard Order, triggering a Hunt, should he detect a Survivor in that time.

"I fear he has left me here to die." — Vittorio Toscano
Knight's_Contract.name: Knight's Contract

Map_of_the_Realm.description:
These unique leather maps were not easy to come by, but when they could not be purchased, they could be taken by force.
  • Increases the Vision range of a Guard during the Patrol Phase by +2 metres.
Map_of_the_Realm.name: Map of the Realm

Pillaged_Mead.description:
Drinks taken from their victims tasted sweet, but such frivolities were often short-lived.
  • Reduces the duration of the Break or Damage action of a Guard by -10 %.
Pillaged_Mead.name: Pillaged Mead

Sharpened_Mount.description:
To stand before the Standard of the Guardia Compagnia was to stand at the threshold between life and death.
  • Increases the Spawn duration of Standards by +15 %.
Sharpened_Mount.name: Sharpened Mount

Tattered_Tabard.description:
Cloaked in heavy fabrics, neither human nor nature could stop them once they had their target.
  • Extends the duration of the Patrol Phase by +8 seconds.
Tattered_Tabard.name: Tattered Tabard

Town_Watch's_Torch.description:
Upon breaching a village, the first thing they would extinguish was the torches, and with them, hope.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect during a Hunt.
Town_Watch's_Torch.name: Town Watch's Torch

Treated_Blade.description:
Durkos Malecek stuck to the shadows, and was an efficient slaughterer.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after summoning The Assassin by -20 %.
Treated_Blade.name: Treated Blade

Bag_of_Holding.description:
The realm itself bends to its astounding capacity, populating trials with even more to take.
  • 2 Treasure Chests are guaranteed to roll a 1 on the Dice Roll.
  • Opening Treasure Chests causes Survivors to suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 15 seconds.
Bag_of_Holding.name: Bag of Holding

Boots_of_Speed.description:
A simple click of their heels grants their wearer incredible pace.
  • The Mage Hand Spell grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect for 2 seconds.
Boots_of_Speed.name: Boots of Speed

Cloak_of_Elvenkind.description:
Its colours are constantly shifting, making you more difficult to detect from afar.
  • Reduces the Terror Radius by -8 metres while the Fly Spell is active.
    • This effect lingers for 6 seconds.
Cloak_of_Elvenkind.name: Cloak of Elvenkind

Cloak_of_Invisibility.description:
A powerful magic item, envied by rogues and the conflict-averse alike.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 10 seconds when all Spells are on cool-down.
Cloak_of_Invisibility.name: Cloak of Invisibility

Crystal_Ball.description:
Used by spellcasters for centuries to scry upon friend and foe alike.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct after a Survivor is revealed to you by the Dispelling Sphere Spell by +3 seconds.
Crystal_Ball.name: Crystal Ball

Dragontooth_Dagger.description:
Made from the actual tooth of a dragon, its edge is jagged and cruel.
  • Hitting Survivors holding a Magic Item with a Basic Attack causes them to suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 45 seconds.
Dragontooth_Dagger.name: Dragontooth Dagger

Glass_Eye.description:
A material component used to cast spells of detection.
  • Increases the radius of the Dispelling Sphere Spell by +2 metres.
  • Increases the Movement speed of the Dispelling Sphere Spell by +10 %.
Glass_Eye.name: Glass Eye

Iridescent_Book_of_Vile_Darkness.description:
The ultimate compilation of cruelty, wickedness and depravity.
  • Using the Fly Spell to pass through a Window blocks the window for Survivors for 45 seconds.
  • Reduces the Flight height of Flying Entites by -0.7 metres, allowing them to damage crouched Survivors.
  • Reduces the number of Flying Entities summoned by the Flight of the Damned Spell by -3.

"What chance do you have against my centuries of preparation?" — Vecna
Iridescent_Book_of_Vile_Darkness.name: Iridescent Book of Vile Darkness

Lantern_of_Revealing.description:
Even those who evade your attacks cannot evade your gaze.
  • The Auras of Survivors narrowly missed by Flying Entities summoned by the Flight of the Damned Spell are revealed to you for 3 seconds.
Lantern_of_Revealing.name: Lantern of Revealing

Ornate_Horn.description:
Once used to rally troops to battle, its very presence brings great armies to bear.
  • Increases the number of Flying Entities summoned by the Flight of the Damned Spell by +1.
Ornate_Horn.name: Ornate Horn

Pearl_of_Power.description:
Its shimmering face energises mages who hold it, allowing them to cast more spells.
  • Reduces the current Cool-down timer of all Spells by -5 seconds after a successful Basic Attack.
Pearl_of_Power.name: Pearl of Power

Potion_of_Speed.description:
A curious concoction that downgrades the rules of physics to mere suggestions.
  • Reduces the Interaction Cool-down time after casting the Fly Spell by -0.35 seconds.
Potion_of_Speed.name: Potion of Speed

Raven's_Feather.description:
A material component most typically used by the Fly spell
  • Extends the Flight duration of the Fly Spell by +0.5 seconds.
Raven's_Feather.name: Raven's Feather

Ring_of_Spell_Storing.description:
A magical ring that rewards those who are well-prepared.
  • Permanently reduces the Cooldown timer of all Spells by -4 seconds.
Ring_of_Spell_Storing.name: Ring of Spell Storing

Ring_of_Telekinesis.description:
Its arcane energy crackles to life when its user manipulates objects from afar.
  • Using the Mage Hand Spell on an upright Pallet increases your Vaulting speed by +10 % for the next 8 seconds.
Ring_of_Telekinesis.name: Ring of Telekinesis

Robe_of_Eyes.description:
When worn, none can escape its bearer's unyielding gaze.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 8 metres of a Treasure Chest are revealed to you for 3 seconds after casting a Spell.
Robe_of_Eyes.name: Robe of Eyes

Staff_of_Withering.description:
Its necrotic power brings its targets closer to death.
  • Entering the radius of the Dispelling Sphere causes Survivors to suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 20 seconds.
Staff_of_Withering.name: Staff of Withering

Tattered_Headband.description:
An enchanted accessory once owned by a powerful summoner. It still carries a whisper of its former magic.
  • Extends the Flight range of Flying Entities summoned by the Flight of the Damned Spell by +4 metres.
Tattered_Headband.name: Tattered Headband

Trickster's_Glove.description:
A glove once belonging to an archane trickster whose mastery of Mage Hand clings to its fibers.
  • Increases the time an upright Pallet is held in place for by the Mage Hand Spell by +0.5 second.
Trickster's_Glove.name: Trickster's Glove

Vorpal_Sword.description:
A powerful magical artifact whose blade has severed many a head from its accompanying body.
  • Entering the radius of the Dispelling Sphere causes injured Survivors to suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 30 seconds.
  • Causes the Mage Hand Spell to break dropped Pallets instead of lifting them back upright.
    • This action takes 4 seconds to complete.

"Only one has ever crossed me and lived to regret it." — Vecna
Vorpal_Sword.name: Vorpal Sword

Bullhorn.description:
The commands screamed into this device riled up some and disoriented others.
  • Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 30 seconds after using a First Aid Spray.
Bullhorn.name: Bullhorn

Chalice_(Gold).description:
A chalice of pure gold used to celebrate the summer solstice.
  • Increases the remaining duration of a Bound by +50 % after colliding with a Survivor.
Chalice_(Gold).name: Chalice (Gold)

Dark_Sunglasses.description:
Glasses enhanced with AR that grant the wearer an invaluable advantage on the battlefield.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds whenever a Survivors reaches Critical Infection.
Dark_Sunglasses.name: Dark Sunglasses

Egg_(Gold).description:
A highly coveted foodstuff.
The cash worth is second only to its regenerative effects.
  • Increases the duration of the Chain Bound Window by +50 %.
Egg_(Gold).name: Egg (Gold)

Green_Herb.description:
A common plant, usually known for its restorative properties.
  • Increases the Infection applied when colliding with Survivors Mid-Bound by +30 %.
Green_Herb.name: Green Herb

Helicopter_Stick.description:
Debris from a helicopter crash.
Few jobs are more dangerous than a helicopter pilot's when Wesker is involved.
  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 8 seconds after using a First Aid Spray.
Helicopter_Stick.name: Helicopter Stick

Iridescent_Uroboros_Vial.description:
The perfect bio-weapon.
Decades of research have led to this.
  • Causes all Survivors to start the Trial infected with Uroboros.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 30 seconds when they reach Critical Infection.

"The entire world will be infected. A new Genesis is at hand and I will be the creator!" — Albert Wesker
Iridescent_Uroboros_Vial.name: Iridescent Uroboros Vial

Jewel_Beetle.description:
A beautiful and valuable insect.
While difficult to capture, it is worth a pretty penny.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Virulent Bound Score Events.
  • Reduces the remaining duration of a Bound by -50 % after colliding with a Survivor.
Jewel_Beetle.name: Jewel Beetle

Lab_Photo.description:
Wesker was as much a researcher as he was a guinea pig for Umbrella's bio-weapons.
  • Grants the ability to break Breakable Walls or Pallets when colliding with them Mid-Bound.
  • You can no longer vault over Pallets using Virulent Bound.

"Only a handful of humans truly matter. Everyone else is just so much chaff. So now I have to separate this chaff from the wheat." — Albert Wesker
Lab_Photo.name: Lab Photo

Leather_Gloves.description:
Gloves of a cold, calculating schemer.
They impart an air of icy professionalism.
  • Reduces the Power Recharge time by -10 %.
Leather_Gloves.name: Leather Gloves

Lion_Medallion.description:
An old medallion depicting a brave lion.
It was made when the Raccoon Police Station was still an art museum.
  • Increases the Throw distance of Survivors grabbed Mid-Bound by +30 %.
Lion_Medallion.name: Lion Medallion

Loose_Crank.description:
To the person whose only tool is a crank, the whole world looks like a crank-shaped hole.
  • Increases your Movement speed during the Chain Bound Window by +8 %.
Loose_Crank.name: Loose Crank

Maiden_Medallion.description:
A medallion depicting a beautiful maiden.
Its purpose was unknown for many years.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds when they reach Critical Infection.
Maiden_Medallion.name: Maiden Medallion

Portable_Safe.description:
A small container that requires a complicated combination to unlock.
  • Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed when injured using Virulent Bound.
Portable_Safe.name: Portable Safe

R.P.D._Shoulder_Walkie.description:
Without the ability to communicate, the cops of Raccoon City are isolated and don’t stand a chance.
  • Reduces the duration of the first Bound by -20 %.
  • Increases the duration of the second Bound by +20 %.
R.P.D._Shoulder_Walkie.name: R.P.D. Shoulder Walkie

Red_Herb.description:
Acts as a reagent that strengthens the effect of that with which it is combined.
  • Increases the Healing time of the First Aid Spray by +2 seconds.
Red_Herb.name: Red Herb

Unicorn_Medallion.description:
An old medallion depicting a majestic unicorn.
It was placed in storage for years.
  • Increases the duration of the first Bound by +20 %.
  • Reduces the duration of the second Bound by -20 %.
Unicorn_Medallion.name: Unicorn Medallion

Uroboros_Tendril.description:
The result of decades of Bio Organic Weapon research.
It will not rest until it has swallowed the entire world.
  • Increases your Movement speed while charging Virulent Bound by +5 %.
Uroboros_Tendril.name: Uroboros Tendril

Uroboros_Virus.description:
For some, the strength and resistance was worth the trade-off.
  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 4 seconds when they reach Critical Infection.

"The balance of the world is changing… and you're completely oblivious to it." — Ricardo Irving
Uroboros_Virus.name: Uroboros Virus

Video_Conference_Device.description:
Many intricate conspiracies were orchestrated on devices just like this one.
  • Reduces the Infection timer of Survivors by -30 %.
Video_Conference_Device.name: Video Conference Device

Admin_Wristband.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility.
While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases the Survivor-Detection range of the Zombies by +4 metres.
  • Increases the Field of View of the Zombies by +17.5 °.
Admin_Wristband.name: Admin Wristband

Adrenaline_Injector.description:
A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.
  • Increases the Duration of Killer Instinct after a Survivor uses a Vaccine by +3 seconds.
Adrenaline_Injector.name: Adrenaline Injector

Brian's_Intestine.description:
The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD.
It is an appetising sight for zombies.
  • Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +0.25 m/s.
Brian's_Intestine.name: Brian's Intestine

Broken_Recovery_Coin.description:
A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath.
It is broken in half.
  • Reduces the number of Supply Cases in the environment by -1.

"This is not how I imagined my first day." — Leon Scott Kennedy
Broken_Recovery_Coin.name: Broken Recovery Coin

Damaged_Syringe.description:
Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.
  • Increases the Injection time of Vaccines by +5 seconds.
Damaged_Syringe.name: Damaged Syringe

Depleted_Ink_Ribbon.description:
Who will save them now? There is something about this ink ribbon being dry that energises zombies.
  • Reduces the Respawn time of disintegrated Zombies by -5 seconds.
  • Increases the Movement speed of Zombies by +0.5 m/s.
  • Once the Exit Gates are powered, disintegrated Zombies respawn in the Exit area.

"Look, just so you know... this is the last fucking time." — Jill Valentine
Depleted_Ink_Ribbon.name: Depleted Ink Ribbon

Iridescent_Umbrella_Badge.description:
A glass-like badge moulded from The Fog itself.
It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds after using a Vaccine.

"Commitment, honesty, integrity. These are the core values that create the foundation of Umbrella Corp." — Doctor Matt Gorkis
Iridescent_Umbrella_Badge.name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge

Jill's_Sandwich.description:
It is tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle.
Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that cannot be missed.
  • The Auras of Survivors unlocking a Supply Case are revealed to you for 12 seconds after they succeed.
Jill's_Sandwich.name: Jill's Sandwich

Licker_Tongue.description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.
  • Increases the Duration of the Hindered Status Effect when becoming Contaminated by +1 second.

"It's like... a nightmare." — Claire Redfield
Licker_Tongue.name: Licker Tongue

Marvin's_Blood.description:
The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City Police Officer.
  • Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Survivors with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.5 points.

"All you need to know is that this place will eat you alive if you're not careful." — Marvin Branagh
Marvin's_Blood.name: Marvin's Blood

Mikhail's_Eye.description:
While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him.
It remains a tasty treat for zombies.
  • Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +0.35 m/s.
Mikhail's_Eye.name: Mikhail's Eye

NE-a_Parasite.description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it is capable of hijacking its host's brain.
  • Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds after becoming Contaminated, or until they cure themselves with a Vaccine.
NE-a_Parasite.name: Ne-α Parasite

Plant_43_Vines.description:
The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.
  • Increases the Opening time of Supply Cases by +4 seconds.
Plant_43_Vines.name: Plant 43 Vines

S.T.A.R.S._Field_Combat_Manual.description:
A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge, edited by Chris Redfield.
  • The Auras of Zombies are highlighted to you in yellow for 6 seconds when they hit a Survivor.
S.T.A.R.S._Field_Combat_Manual.name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual

Serotonin_Injector.description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds, after a Zombie is disintegrated by any means.
Serotonin_Injector.name: Serotonin Injector

Shattered_S.T.A.R.S._Badge.description:
A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.
  • Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +1.5 m/s for 60 seconds each time a Generator is completed.

"S.T.A.R.S..." — The Nemesis
Shattered_S.T.A.R.S._Badge.name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge

T-Virus_Sample.description:
A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.
  • Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +1 point.
T-Virus_Sample.name: T-Virus Sample

Tyrant_Gore.description:
A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat.
There are signs of severe burns.
  • Reduces the Respawn time of disintegrated Zombies by -7.5 seconds.
  • Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.
Tyrant_Gore.name: Tyrant Gore

Visitor_Wristband.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility.
It also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases the Survivor-Detection range of the Zombies by +2 metres.
  • Increases the Field of View of the Zombies by +10 °.
Visitor_Wristband.name: Visitor Wristband

Zombie_Heart.description:
The heart of an eviscerated zombie.
It is considered hazardous waste as it is certainly teeming with viruses.
  • Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.

"Words won't work on this thing." — Leon Scott Kennedy
Zombie_Heart.name: Zombie Heart

\"Z\"_Block.description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which's only recognisable feature is the letter "Z".
  • Using Dream Projection triggers Killer Instinct for 6 seconds on all Survivors within 16 metres of the Generator you teleported to.
\"Z\"_Block.name: "Z" Block

Black_Box.description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effect:

  • Blocks opened Exit Gates for 15 seconds.
Black_Box.name: Black Box

Blue_Dress.description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which's front is ruined by large cuts.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

  • The Auras of Survivors failing Repairing or Healing Skill Checks are revealed to you for 4 seconds.
  • Increases the Penalty for failing those Skill Checks by -4 %.
Blue_Dress.name: Blue Dress

Cat_Block.description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping Cat and the letter "C".
  • Using Dream Projection triggers Killer Instinct for 4 seconds on all Survivors within 16 metres of the Generator you teleported to.
Cat_Block.name: Cat Block

Class_Photo.description:
A large photograph taken at Badham Preschool showing the cheerful class of '94-95.

When channelling Dream Projection, the following effects apply:

  • All Generators spew blood.
  • Suppresses the appearance of the Husk.
You can no longer cancel Dream Projection.
Class_Photo.name: Class Photo

Garden_Rake.description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.

Switches the type of Dream Traps used in the Trial:

  • Start the Trial with 7 Dream Pallets.
Garden_Rake.name: Garden Rake

Green_Dress.description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

  • The Auras of Survivors failing Repairing or Healing Skill Checks are revealed to you for 3 seconds.
  • Increases the Penalty for failing those Skill Checks by -4 %.
Green_Dress.name: Green Dress

Jump_Rope_(Dream_Demon).description:
A long Double-Dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effect:

  • Increases the volume of Grunts of Pain of injured Survivors by +50 %.
Jump_Rope_(Dream_Demon).name: Jump Rope

Kid's_Drawing.description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
  • Grants 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category when a Survivor triggers a Dream Snare.
  • Reduces the Movement Speed penalty inflicted by Dream Snares by -10 %.
Kid's_Drawing.name: Kid's Drawing

Nancy's_Masterpiece.description:
A painting of a Character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasure memory.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by a stack-able -3 % for each asleep Survivor, up to a maximum of -12 %.
Nancy's_Masterpiece.name: Nancy's Masterpiece

Nancy's_Sketch.description:
A crude and bold sketch made with Fusain, signed by Nancy H.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by a stack-able -2 % for each asleep Survivor, up to a maximum of -8 %.
Nancy's_Sketch.name: Nancy's Sketch

Outdoor_Rope.description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effect:

  • Increases the audible range of their Repair noises by +8 metres.
Outdoor_Rope.name: Outdoor Rope

Paint_Thinner.description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.

Switches the type of Dream Traps used in the Trial:

  • Start the Trial with 7 Dream Pallets.
  • The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
Paint_Thinner.name: Paint Thinner

Pill_Bottle.description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called Zoneral.
  • Reduces the threshold for intermittent Invisbility to a range of 12 to 24 metres.
  • Reduces the threshold for full Invisibility to a distance of 24 metres.
    • This effect also applies when carrying a Survivor.
Pill_Bottle.name: Pill Bottle

Prototype_Claws.description:
A home-made tool to facilitate bush trimming.

Switches the type of Dream Traps used in the Trial:

  • Start the Trial with 7 Dream Pallets.
  • The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed to you for 4 seconds.
Prototype_Claws.name: Prototype Claws

Red_Paint_Brush.description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
  • All Survivors start the Trial asleep.
  • Survivors can no longer wake up by failing Skill Checks.
Red_Paint_Brush.name: Red Paint Brush

Sheep_Block.description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two woolly Lambs grazing and the letter "S".
  • Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Sheep_Block.name: Sheep Block

Swing_Chains.description:
Rusty, but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.

Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effect:

  • Increases the volume of Footsteps of Survivors by +50 %.
Swing_Chains.name: Swing Chains

Unicorn_Block.description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing Unicorn and the letter "U".
  • Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 90 seconds.
Unicorn_Block.name: Unicorn Block

Wool_Shirt.description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".
  • Increases the Penalty for failing Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by -4 %.
Wool_Shirt.name: Wool Shirt

\"Bad_Man's\"_Last_Breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient known as the "Bad Man".
In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.
  • Hitting Survivors with a Special Attack grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.

"Bad Man's" Last Breath" has a cool-down of 45 seconds.
\"Bad_Man's\"_Last_Breath.name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath

Anxious_Gasp.description:
The gasp of surprise collected from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl" that The Nurse was fond of.
Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
  • Coming within 1 metre of Survivors while teleporting causes them to scream and reveal their location.
  • Grants 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Anxious_Gasp.name: Anxious Gasp

Ataxic_Respiration.description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the asylum patient known as the "Catatonic Boy".
Normally stable and calm, it becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
  • Reduces the duration of Fatigue by -7 %.
Ataxic_Respiration.name: Ataxic Respiration

Bad_Man_Keepsake.description:
A rotten molar ripped from the "Cataontic Boy's" cold dead hand.
Normally stable and calm, it becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
  • Survivors hit with a Special Attack have their Auras revealed to you, if they are healing or being healed within 28 metres of your location for 60 seconds.
Bad_Man_Keepsake.name: Bad Man Keepsake

Campbell's_Last_Breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum priest Father Campbell.
In the hand of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
  • Reappearing from a fully charged Blink, you automatically Blink at full charge in the direction you are facing.
    • This requires that you have at least 1 Charge left after the initial Blink.
Campbell's_Last_Breath.name: Campbell's Last Breath

Catatonic_Boy's_Treasure.description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement.
Taken from the "Catatonic Boy's" body.
  • Reduces the additional Fatigue applied by Chain Blinks by -65 %.
Catatonic_Boy's_Treasure.name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure

Dark_Cincture.description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning.
Taken from Father Campbell's body.
  • Increases your Movement speed during the Chain Blink Window by +30 %.
Dark_Cincture.name: Dark Cincture

Dull_Bracelet.description:
A worthless piece of jewellery that might have an important significance to someone.
Taken from the "Anxious Girl's" body.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Precise Blink Score Events.
  • Reduces the maximum range of the Blink by -20 %.
Dull_Bracelet.name: Dull Bracelet

Fragile_Wheeze.description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell.
Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
  • Survivors hit with a Special Attack suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.
Fragile_Wheeze.name: Fragile Wheeze

Heavy_Panting.description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from Harvey Kavanagh, the asylum's "Fat Orderly".
Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
  • Extends the Lunge duration of Special Attacks to 130 %, which increases your Attack range by +30 %.
    • This effect only applies after the second or third Blink.
Heavy_Panting.name: Heavy Panting

Jenner's_Last_Breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl".
In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
  • After exhausting all of your Blinks, but before succumbing to Fatigue, press the Active Ability button to immediately Blink back to your starting location.
  • Recharges your Power by +1 Charge.
Jenner's_Last_Breath.name: Jenner's Last Breath

Kavanagh's_Last_Breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum orderly Harvey Kavanagh, also known as the "Fat Orderly".
In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
  • When succumbing to Fatigue, all Survivors within 8 metres of your location suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Kavanagh's_Last_Breath.name: Kavanagh's Last Breath

Matchbox.description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons.
Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
  • Increases your Movement speed to 4.4 m/s for the entire Trial.
  • Restricts your Power to just 1 Blink.
    • This cannot be altered by other Add-ons.
Matchbox.name: Matchbox

Metal_Spoon.description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon.
Confiscated from Room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
  • Survivors hit by a Special Attack have the volume of their Grunts of Pain increased by +50 % for the next 60 seconds.
Metal_Spoon.name: Metal Spoon

Plaid_Flannel.description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel.
The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
  • Unlocks the ability to see the Landing zone of the Blink.
Plaid_Flannel.name: Plaid Flannel

Pocket_Watch_(Spencer's_Last_Breath).description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces.
Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
  • Increases the duration of the Chain Blink Window by +0.2 seconds.
Pocket_Watch_(Spencer's_Last_Breath).name: Pocket Watch

Spasmodic_Breath.description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man".
Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.

Hitting a Survivor with a Special Attack causes the following effects for 60 seconds:

  • Increases your Movement speed to 4.6 m/s.
  • Disables your Power.
Spasmodic_Breath.name: Spasmodic Breath

Torn_Bookmark.description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book.
Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
  • Increases the number of available Power Tokens by +1.
  • Increases the Power Recharge time to 130 %.
Torn_Bookmark.name: Torn Bookmark

White_Nit_Comb.description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic.
Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Blink Attack Score Events.
  • Reduces the Lunge duration of Special Attacks by -0.15 seconds, which reduces your Attack range by -50 %.
White_Nit_Comb.name: White Nit Comb

Wooden_Horse.description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse.
Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
  • Reduces the additional Fatigue applied by missed Special Attacks by -0.5 seconds.
Wooden_Horse.name: Wooden Horse

Akito's_Crutch.description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree.
Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +1 m/s.
Akito's_Crutch.name: Akito's Crutch

Blackened_Toenail.description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple.
Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.
  • Increases your Movement speed while in Absorption Mode by 0.4 m/s.

"If a father sacrifices not for his children, then who does he father?" — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:12
Blackened_Toenail.name: Blackened Toenail

Bloody_Sash.description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan "The Noble Impostor".
Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often revelling at the sash in secret.
  • Increases your Movement speed while in Absorption Mode by 0.7 m/s.
Bloody_Sash.name: Bloody Sash

Child's_Wooden_Sword.description:
Akito's practice sword.
The child had little use for it after his injury.
  • Increases the Aura-reading range on Blood Orbs in the environment by +3 metres.
Child's_Wooden_Sword.name: Child's Wooden Sword

Chipped_Saihai.description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro.
It was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.
  • Increases the duration of Blood Fury by +6 seconds.
Chipped_Saihai.name: Chipped Saihai

Cracked_Sakazuki.description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony.
It never made it through the night before being damaged.
  • Reduces the Transition time into Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Transition time out of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Cracked_Sakazuki.name: Cracked Sakazuki

Ink_Lion.description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka Estate.
Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.
  • Reduces the Transition time into Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Transition time out of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Power Gauge penalty for downing Survivors during Blood Fury by -2 seconds.
Ink_Lion.name: Ink Lion

Iridescent_Family_Crest.description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.
  • Causes Survivors within 24 metres of your location to scream and reveal their location to you after hitting the ground with a missed Demon Strike.

"Know who you are so you may shield your heart." — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:2
Iridescent_Family_Crest.name: Iridescent Family Crest

Kanai-Anzen_Talisman.description:
A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +0.64 m/s.
Kanai-Anzen_Talisman.name: Kanai-Anzen Talisman

Lion_Fang.description:
A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolises power and nobility.
  • Increases the duration of Blood Fury by +10 seconds.
Lion_Fang.name: Lion Fang

Paper_Lantern.description:
Perhaps a memento of simpler times, before rage fully enveloped him.
  • Increases the Floating speed of Blood Orbs towards you when in Absorption Mode by +4 m/s.
Paper_Lantern.name: Paper Lantern

Polished_Maedate.description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.
  • Increases the passive Charge rate of Blood Fury by +0.1 c/s.
Polished_Maedate.name: Polished Maedate

Renjiro's_Bloody_Glove.description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son Kazan.
  • The Auras of Survivors coming into contact with a Blood Orb are revealed to you for 2 seconds.
    • This effect stacks per Blood Orb.
  • Causes Blood Orbs to be visible to Survivors and to be absorbed when they come into contact with them.

"When all else spills out, cling only to your honour." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:12
Renjiro's_Bloody_Glove.name: Renjiro's Bloody Glove

Rotting_Rope.description:
Had the rope been stronger it would have likely held Kazan.
As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.
  • Increases the Aura-reading range on Blood Orbs in the environment by +2 metres.

"Though Death is focused, he has been known to blink." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:5
Rotting_Rope.name: Rotting Rope

Scalped_Topknot.description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honour.
The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.
  • Reduces the Charge time of Demon Dash by -0.5 seconds.
Scalped_Topknot.name: Scalped Topknot

Shattered_Wakizashi.description:
The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.
  • Increases the passive Charge rate of Blood Fury by +0.2 c/s.
Shattered_Wakizashi.name: Shattered Wakizashi

Splintered_Hull.description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka.
Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.
  • Increases the Spawn frequency of Blood Orbs from injured Survivors by +33 %.
  • Increases the number of Blood Orbs spawned when Survivors perform specific interactions by +1.

"To plan subterfuge, begin with a counsel of none." — Renjiro's Doctrine 7:9
Splintered_Hull.name: Splintered Hull

Tear-Soaked_Tenugui.description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.
  • Reduces the Power Gauge penalty for downing Survivors during Blood Fury by -4 seconds.
Tear-Soaked_Tenugui.name: Tear-Soaked Tenugui

Wooden_Oni_Mask.description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.
  • Increases the Spawn frequency of Blood Orbs from injured Survivors by +14 %.
  • Increases the number of Blood Orbs spawned when Survivors perform specific interactions by +1.

"It is no coincidence that man is so familiar with demons." — Renjiro's Doctrine 3:8
Wooden_Oni_Mask.name: Wooden Oni Mask

Yamaoka_Sashimono.description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.
  • Increases the duration of Blood Fury by +8 seconds.
Yamaoka_Sashimono.name: Yamaoka Sashimono

Bloody_Fingernails.description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well.
Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
  • Increases the Speed Boost duration after Projection by +50 %.
Bloody_Fingernails.name: Bloody Fingernails

Cabin_Sign.description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape.
Carries the memory of those first curses.
  • Reduces the time it takes for TVs to turn back on after Projection by -4.5 seconds.
Cabin_Sign.name: Cabin Sign

Clump_of_Hair.description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
  • Reduces the threshold for full Invisibility while Demanifested by -6 metres.
Clump_of_Hair.name: Clump of Hair

Distorted_Photo.description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of themselves distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.
  • Causes all Survivors within 16 metres of your location who witness your Manifestation to scream and reveal their Auras for 4 seconds.

"Why is it only you were saved?" — Sadaoka Yamamura
Distorted_Photo.name: Distorted Photo

Iridescent_Videotape.description:
The original tape containing Sadako's curse.
  • Projection no longer turns off TVs, but also no longer applies any Condemned.
  • Increases the time required for TVs to turn back on after having been turned off by Survivors by +20 %.

"That video... It's not of this world. It's Sadako's rage." — Ryuji Takayama
Iridescent_Videotape.name: Iridescent Videotape

Mother's_Comb.description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape.
Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
  • Highlights the Auras of all turned-off TVs in yellow.
  • Causes TVs being turned off to trigger a Loud Noise Notification.
Mother's_Comb.name: Mother's Comb

Mother's_Mirror.description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house.
A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
  • Increases the duration of your intermittent Invisibility after Manifesting by +2 seconds.
Mother's_Mirror.name: Mother's Mirror

Old_Newspaper.description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
  • Increases the duration of your full Invisibility after Manifesting by +33 %.
Old_Newspaper.name: Old Newspaper

Reiko's_Watch.description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi.
A distracting and constant reminder of one's impending doom.
  • Increases the duration of your full Invisibility while Demanifested by +25 %.
Reiko's_Watch.name: Reiko's Watch

Remote_Control.description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin.
It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.
  • The Auras of all Survivors within 12 metres of powered TVs are revealed to you for 7 seconds after using Projection.

"She killed a man just by willing him dead. That's power of a different order from her mother." — Ryuji Takayama
Remote_Control.name: Remote Control

Rickety_Pinwheel.description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima.
It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
  • Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect when within 8 metres of powered TVs.
    • This effect lingers for 7 seconds after turning off a TV.
Rickety_Pinwheel.name: Rickety Pinwheel

Ring_Drawing.description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi.
Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
  • Hooking a Survivor carrying a VHS Tape causes all other Survivors to gain +1 Stack of Condemned.
Ring_Drawing.name: Ring Drawing

Sea-Soaked_Cloth.description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape.
Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect when within 8 metres of powered TVs.
    • This effect lingers for 7 seconds after turning off a TV.
Sea-Soaked_Cloth.name: Sea-Soaked Cloth

Tape_Editing_Deck.description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyse and copy the tape.
Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
  • Causes all Survivors start the Trial with a VHS Tape.
    • All Survivors must bring their VHS Tape to the TV that is farthest from their current location.
  • The Auras of Survivors inserting a VHS Tape into a TV are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

"Frolic in brine, goblins be thine." — Message hidden in Sakado's Tape
Tape_Editing_Deck.name: Tape Editing Deck

Telephone.description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call.
They are frozen in fear as they realise they have seven days left to live.
  • Survivors suffer from a -3 % Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds when Manifesting within 7 metres of them.

"I saw a weird video the other day... after it ended, someone called us. Some kind of prank call." — Tomoko Oishi
Telephone.name: Telephone

VCR.description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's Tape.
It is still warm to the touch.
  • Causes all TVs to play the Projection Effects when using Projection.
VCR.name: VCR

Videotape_Copy.description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako.
It dampens the desire for vengeance.
  • Extends the radius around TVs within which Survivors gain Condemned from Projection by +2 metres.
Videotape_Copy.name: Videotape Copy

Well_Stone.description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
  • Reduces the time it takes for TVs to turn back on after Projection by -7 seconds.
Well_Stone.name: Well Stone

Well_Water.description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die.
Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +2 seconds after Manifesting by any means.
Well_Water.name: Well Water

Yoichi's_Fishing_Net.description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather.
A reminder that death comes to us all.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect after acquiring at least 4 Stacks of Condemned.
Yoichi's_Fishing_Net.name: Yoichi's Fishing Net

Amanda's_Letter.description:
A blackmailing Letter for the attention of Amanda.
Fills the reader with rage and focus.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 16 metres are revealed to you when Crouched.
  • Reduces the number of carried Reverse Bear Traps by -2.

"Amanda, you were with Cecil the night Jill lost Gideon. You killed their child. You know it and I know it." — Detective Hoffman
Amanda's_Letter.name: Amanda's Letter

Amanda's_Secret.description:
A black metal box containing a knife and various medical supplies, such as bandages and compresses.
Deep cuts reduce stress and awaken the senses.
  • Survivors removing their Reverse Bear Trap trigger a Loud Noise Notification and have their Auras revealed to you for 6 seconds.
Amanda's_Secret.name: Amanda's Secret

Bag_of_Gears.description:
A few mechanical parts that allow the creation of challenging Jigsaw Boxes and easier to install Reverse Bear Traps.
  • Increases the Attachment speed of Reverse Bear Traps by +50 %.
  • Reduces the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by -14 %.
Bag_of_Gears.name: Bag of Gears

Combat_Straps.description:
Leather straps that hold fabric in place for nimbler movement.
  • Increases the Transition speed into the Crouched State by +10 %.
Combat_Straps.name: Combat Straps

Crate_of_Gears.description:
This collection of mechanical parts allows the creation of extra-challenging Jigsaw Boxes and Reverse Bear Traps that are easier to install.
  • Increases the Attach speed of Reverse Bear Traps by +50 %.
  • Reduces the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by -25 %.
Crate_of_Gears.name: Crate of Gears

Face_Mask.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
The heavy cloth face mask, laced with a sedative, partially suffocates the target, making it hard to concentrate.
  • Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer permanently from the Blindness Status Effect.
Face_Mask.name: Face Mask

Interlocking_Razor.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
The addition of interlocking razor blades makes it impossible to move suddenly in the Jigsaw Box without slitting one's wrists.
  • While injured, Survivors failing a Skill Check at a Jigsaw Box become afflicted by the Deep Wound Status Effect.
Interlocking_Razor.name: Interlocking Razor

Jigsaw's_Annotated_Plan.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design laid down on paper and annotated by Jigsaw.
  • Increases the number of carried Reverse Bear Traps by +1.
  • Increases the Death timer of Reverse Bear Traps by +10 seconds.
  • Reduces the Death timer of all Active Reverse Bear Traps by -10 seconds each time a Generator is completed.
Jigsaw's_Annotated_Plan.name: Jigsaw's Annotated Plan

Jigsaw's_Sketch.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design sketched in detail on a sheet of paper.
  • Increases the number of carried Reverse Bear Traps by +1.
  • The Auras of Generators being repaired by Survivors wearing a Reverse Bear Traps are highlighted to you in yellow.
Jigsaw's_Sketch.name: Jigsaw's Sketch

John's_Medical_File.description:
The medical file of a cancerous man.
Fills the reader with dread and recklessness.
  • Increases your Movement speed by +10 % when Crouched.
John's_Medical_File.name: John's Medical File

Last_Will.description:
A latched wooden box with a satin lining, offered as part of a last will.
  • Increases your Movement speed during the Ambush Dash Attack by +6 %.
  • Increases the Charge time of the Ambush Dash Attack by +33 %.
Last_Will.name: Last Will

Razor_Wires.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
The addition of razor sharp wires makes it extra difficult and potentially painful to search them.
  • While healthy, Survivors failing a Skill Check at a Jigsaw Box become injured.
  • Increases the Skill Check difficulty by +20 %.
Razor_Wires.name: Razor Wires

Rules_Set_No.2.description:
Not all games need to have the same rules.
  • Disables the ability of Survivors to see the Auras of Jigsaw Boxes, until their Reverse Bear Trap becomes active.

"Listen, there are rules." — Jigsaw
Rules_Set_No.2.name: Rules Set No.2

Rusty_Attachments.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
Mouth spikes, covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.
Rusty_Attachments.name: Rusty Attachments

Shattered_Syringe.description:
Symbol of a broken way of life.
Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by -10 %.
Shattered_Syringe.name: Shattered Syringe

Slow-Release_Toxin.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
A poison that is not fatal, but weakens the body and makes it nearly impossible to recover fully from any effort.
  • Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer permanently from the Exhausted Status Effect.
Slow-Release_Toxin.name: Slow-Release Toxin

Tampered_Timer.description:
A timer that has been fiddled with.
A spring in the mechanism forces the gears to turn faster.
  • Reduces the Death timer of Reverse Bear Traps by -20 seconds.
Tampered_Timer.name: Tampered Timer

Utility_Blades.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
Sharp blades attached to the Trap's interior lacerate the victim with every movement.
  • Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect whenever they are injured by any means.
Utility_Blades.name: Utility Blades

Video_Tape.description:
A recording of Jigsaw, explaining the game's rules to Amanda.
Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • All Survivors start the Trial with a Reverse Bear Trap attached to them.
Video_Tape.name: Video Tape

Workshop_Grease.description:
A simple tube of grease, used to lubricate the mechanisms of the hidden blade.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by -10 %.
  • Increases the Charge speed of the Ambush Dash Attack by +50 %.
Workshop_Grease.name: Workshop Grease

Ashen_Apple.description:
A peeled apple rolled into sanctified ashes.
Eating such a fruit warded off the malignantly envious spirits of the deceased.
  • Causes 1 Pool of Devotion to spawn in the Corrupted state.
  • Increases the number of available Pools of Devotion by +1.
Ashen_Apple.name: Ashen Apple

Black_Incense.description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings.
The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.
  • The Auras of vomitting Infected Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds.
Black_Incense.name: Black Incense

Blessed_Apple.description:
A perfectly ripe fruit to break fast during the purification ceremony.
Delicious.
  • Causes 1 Pool of Devotion to spawn in the Corrupted state.
Blessed_Apple.name: Blessed Apple

Devotee's_Amulet.description:
A blood stone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian God of Mayhem and Pestilence.
Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.
  • Increases the duration of Corrupt Purge by +20 seconds.
Devotee's_Amulet.name: Devotee's Amulet

Emetic_Potion.description:
A mustard-water based syrup that induces vomiting when consumed.
Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases the Infection gain from Vile Purge by +30 %.
Emetic_Potion.name: Emetic Potion

Exorcism_Amulet.description:
An obsidian amulet to ward off sickness during exorcism rituals. Inscribed with a prayer to the God of Mayhem and Pestilence.
Fills the wearer with fierce devotion.
  • Increases the duration of Corrupt Purge by +10 seconds.
Exorcism_Amulet.name: Exorcism Amulet

Haematite_Seal.description:
A cylindrical seal forged from a metallic hard-stone, engraved with bird-headed beings that stood next to strange machines.
Used as a container for sanctified ashes.
  • Increases the Infection duration on Props hit with Vile Purge by +30 seconds.
Haematite_Seal.name: Haematite Seal

Healing_Salve.description:
A bitterly pungent paste of crushed roots, which were marinated in fish brine for three days and in wine for two.
Applied on skin rashes.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.25 seconds.
Healing_Salve.name: Healing Salve

Incensed_Ointment.description:
A dark waxy paste, laced with cedar sap that diffuses a sweet and earthy aroma.
Applied directly on infected skin.
  • Ingesting Corruption causes all Survivors in your Terror Radius to scream and reveal their locations to you.
Incensed_Ointment.name: Incensed Ointment

Infected_Emetic.description:
A disgusting syrup of unknown origin.
The thick yellow liquid is consumed to induce vomiting.
Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases the Infection gain from Vile Purge by +40 %.
Infected_Emetic.name: Infected Emetic

Iridescent_Seal.description:
A translucent cylindrical seal moulded from The Fog itself with the effigy of The Plague.
Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.
  • Automatically enter Corrupt Purge whenever a Generator is completed.
  • Reduces the duration of Corrupt Purge by -20 seconds.
Iridescent_Seal.name: Iridescent Seal

Limestone_Seal.description:
A cylindrical seal made from porous stone that displays a ritualistic scene with winged deities.
  • Increases the Infection duration on Props hit with Vile Purge by +20 seconds.
Limestone_Seal.name: Limestone Seal

Olibanum_Incense.description:
Precious resin extracted from Boswellia trees, used during ceremonies for their sweet citrusy fragrance.
  • The Auras of Survivors cleansing at a Pool of Devotion are revealed to you for 4 seconds.
Olibanum_Incense.name: Olibanum Incense

Potent_Tincture.description:
A frothing, murky liquid that permeates the air with an acute aroma of herbs and alcohol.
Applied directly on blisters.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.4 seconds.
Potent_Tincture.name: Potent Tincture

Prayer_Tablet_Fragment.description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
  • Increases the Infection duration on Props hit with Vile Purge by +40 seconds.
  • Increases the Infection gained while performing Interactions for Survivors by +100 %.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
  • Vile Purge no longer affects Survivors directly.
Prayer_Tablet_Fragment.name: Prayer Tablet Fragment

Prophylactic_Amulet.description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
  • Reduces the number of available Pools of Devotion by -2.
Prophylactic_Amulet.name: Prophylactic Amulet

Rubbing_Oil.description:
A beaker of rubbing oil with expectorant quality.
Exudes the evergreen scent of laurel and rosemary.
  • Increases the Charge speed of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +50 %.
Rubbing_Oil.name: Rubbing Oil

Severed_Toe.description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck.
Radiates with vile power.
  • Increases the Infection gained while performing Interactions for Survivors by +50 %.
Severed_Toe.name: Severed Toe

Vile_Emetic.description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients.
Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting.
Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases the Projectile speed of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +10 %.
Vile_Emetic.name: Vile Emetic

Worship_Tablet.description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold, showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.
  • Increases the Ingestion speed at Pools of Devotion by +100 %.
  • Increases your Movement speed while holding Corrupt Purge by 4.4 %.
Worship_Tablet.name: Worship Tablet

Blond_Hair.description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +10 seconds.
  • Increases the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to 150 %.
Blond_Hair.name: Blond Hair

Boyfriend's_Memo.description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
  • Increases the reach of Lunge Attacks while in Evil Within I by +50 %.

"The note is signed: D."
Boyfriend's_Memo.name: Boyfriend's Memo

Dead_Rabbit.description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -25 % while in Evil Within II.
  • Increases your Terror Radius by +25 % while in Evil Within III.
Dead_Rabbit.name: Dead Rabbit

Fragrant_Tuft_of_Hair.description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp.
Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
  • Grants unlimited duration to Evil Within III.
