  • Increases the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to 300 %.
Fragrant_Tuft_of_Hair.name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair

Glass_Fragment.description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object.
It is impossible to determine its origin.
  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds after stalking them for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I.
Glass_Fragment.name: Glass Fragment

Hair_Bow.description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +30 seconds.
  • Increases the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to 150 %.
Hair_Bow.name: Hair Bow

Hair_Brush.description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +20 seconds.
  • Increases the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to 150 %.
Hair_Brush.name: Hair Brush

J._Myers_Memorial.description:
A glossy page ripped from the 1965 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
  • Increases your Stalk rate by +25 %.
J._Myers_Memorial.name: J. Myers Memorial

Jewellery.description:
A large necklace made of beads an inexpensive metals.
One of Judith's favourites.
  • Increases your Movement speed by +20 % while Stalking.
Jewellery.name: Jewellery

Jewellery_Box.description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
  • Increases your Movement speed by +30 % while Stalking.
Jewellery_Box.name: Jewellery Box

Judith's_Journal.description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers.
Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
  • Increases your Stalk rate on your Obsession by +40 %.
Judith's_Journal.name: Judith's Journal

Judith's_Tombstone.description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
  • Grants the ability to kill healthy and injured Survivors by your own hands while in Evil Within III.
  • Increases the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to 300 %.
  • Reduces your Movement speed by -9 % while in Evil Within III.

"Here lies our beloved daughter."
Judith's_Tombstone.name: Judith's Tombstone

Lock_of_Hair.description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +40 seconds.
  • Increases the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to 200 %.
Lock_of_Hair.name: Lock of Hair

Memorial_Flower.description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
  • Increases your Stalk rate by +11 %.
Memorial_Flower.name: Memorial Flower

Mirror_Shard.description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 5 seconds after stalking them for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II.
Mirror_Shard.name: Mirror Shard

Reflective_Fragment.description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 2 seconds after stalking them for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II.
Reflective_Fragment.name: Reflective Fragment

Scratched_Mirror.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
  • The Auras of all Survivors within 32 metres of your location are revealed to you while Stalking.
  • Evil Within can no longer progress past Tier I.
  • Grants +200 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category for Hit Score Events on top of the regular Bloodpoints granted in the Brutality Category.
Scratched_Mirror.name: Scratched Mirror

Tacky_Earrings.description:
A very cheap piece of jewellery made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
  • Increases your Movement speed by +10 % while Stalking.
Tacky_Earrings.name: Tacky Earrings

Tombstone_Piece.description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
  • Grants the ability to kill healthy and injured Survivors by your own hands while in Evil Within III.
  • Killing a Survivor drains the Power Gauge by -200 %, but not past Evil Within II.
  • Increases the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to 250 %.
Tombstone_Piece.name: Tombstone Piece

Vanity_Mirror.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
  • The Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres of your location are revealed to you while Stalking.
  • Evil Within can no longer progress past Tier II.
  • Grants +150 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category for Hit Score Events on top of the regular Bloodpoints granted in the Brutality Category.
Vanity_Mirror.name: Vanity Mirror

Android_Arm.description:
Destroying the other HUX units not only made its extermination of humans easier, it also gave it more parts to work with.
  • Increases the Spreading distance of Temporal Slipstream between Survivors by +2 metres.
  • Increases the Spreading speed of Temporal Slipstream between Survivors by +25 %.
Android_Arm.name: Android Arm

Broken_Security_Key.description:
Dozens of security measures were applied across the ship's equipment, and many of them were in a state of disrepair.
  • Reduces the Reboot timer of disabled Biopods by -15 %.
Broken_Security_Key.name: Broken Security Key

Cremated_Remains.description:
After extracting the other colonists' DNA, he burned their remains.
  • Slipstreamed Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
Cremated_Remains.name: Cremated Remains

Crew_Manifest.description:
A complete list of biographical data on the entire crew of the ship sent to Dvarka.
  • The Auras of newly Slipstreamed Survivors are revealed to you for 8 seconds.
  • Increases the Spreading distance of Temporal Slipstream between Survivors by +2 metres.
Crew_Manifest.name: Crew Manifest

Cryo_Gel.description:
A no-friction gel applied to crew members before entering deep cryo sleep.
  • Causes Slipstreamed Survivors hit with a Basic Attack to suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect.
Cryo_Gel.name: Cryo Gel

Denied_Requisition_Form.description:
Despite the advent of light speed technology, it seemed nothing could make bureaucracy any faster.
  • Causes all Survivors to start the Trial infected with Temporal Slipstream.
  • Increases the maximum Printing time of the first batch of EMPs at the start of the Trial by +30 seconds.
Denied_Requisition_Form.name: Denied Requisition Form

Diagnostic_Tool_(Construction).description:
A device that gives highly accurate information on the lay of the land.
  • The Auras of Survivors picking up an EMP are revealed to you for 8 seconds.
Diagnostic_Tool_(Construction).name: Diagnostic Tool (Construction)

Diagnostic_Tool_(Repair).description:
A device that can find the flaws in constructed objects.
Intended to help with repair.
  • Increases the Targeting range of Biopods by +4 metres.
Diagnostic_Tool_(Repair).name: Diagnostic Tool (Repair)

Foreign_Plant_Fibres.description:
Xenobotanists would have a field day with these strange samples of alien plant life.
  • Reduces the duration of the Movement Speed penalty after being stunned by a Pallet during Overclock Mode by -20 %.
Foreign_Plant_Fibres.name: Foreign Plant Fibres

Heavy_Water.description:
A by-product of the micro-fission reactors powering cryo and life support.
Even a tiny leak would prove disastrous for onboard sensors.
  • Reduces the Aura-reveal range of Supply Cases by -8 metres.
Heavy_Water.name: Heavy Water

Hologram_Generator.description:
Originally used for communication and entertainment, this has been repurposed for obfuscation.
  • After teleporting to a Slipstreamed Survivor from a Biopod, they suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Hologram_Generator.name: Hologram Generator

Hyperawareness_Spray.description:
Used by crew members during long shifts to avoid lapses in focus.
Side effects of overuse include paranoia and, in extreme cases, hallucination.
  • Causes all Slipstreamed Survivors to hear a fake nearby Terror Radius.
Hyperawareness_Spray.name: Hyperawareness Spray

Iridescent_Crystal_Shard.description:
A crystal from the alien structure that gave it sentience.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 10 metres of a newly placed Biopod are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

"HELLO WORLD." — HUX-A7-13
Iridescent_Crystal_Shard.name: Iridescent Crystal Shard

Kid's_Ball_Glove.description:
A kid's baseball glove owned by one of the colonists.
His memories of a youth playing catch were implanted.
  • Extends the duration of Overclock Mode by +8 %.
Kid's_Ball_Glove.name: Kid's Ball Glove

Live_Wires.description:
Unconnected wires attached to a live current that have a tendency to deliver a shocking surprise.
  • Causes Survivors to scream and interrupt their current interaction after removing Temporal Slipstream.
Live_Wires.name: Live Wires

Nanomachine_Gel.description:
A gel that can heal wounds extremely quickly.
However, the machines in it have a history of being hacked to hurt people too.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Biopods by -15 % after teleporting to a Slipstreamed Survivor.
Nanomachine_Gel.name: Nanomachine Gel

Nutritional_Slurry.description:
Made for the organics, this disgusting concoction works well to nourish any organic matter.
  • Increases the number of carried Biopods by +2.
Nutritional_Slurry.name: Nutritional Slurry

Soma_Family_Photo.description:
A sentimental object that grounds someone to an imagined past.
Inflicting Survivors with Temporal Slipstream from a Biopod has the following effects:
  • Causes them to suffer from a -3 % Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds.
  • Causes them to suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect if they are injured.

"YOUR ATTACHMENT TO ILLUSIONS IS WEAKNESS." — HUX-A7-13
Soma_Family_Photo.name: Soma Family Photo

Spent_Oxygen_Tank.description:
Without air to breathe, organics do not last long.
  • Slipstreamed Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 6 seconds.
Spent_Oxygen_Tank.name: Spent Oxygen Tank

Ultrasonic_Sensor.description:
A limitation of organic hearing is a limited aural spectrum.
Expanding that range is like gaining an entirely new sense.
  • Exiting a Biopod within 2 seconds of afflicting a Survivor with Temporal Slipstream reduces your Terror Radius by -12 metres for 12 seconds.
Ultrasonic_Sensor.name: Ultrasonic Sensor

Adaptive_Lighting.description:
The Drone takes account of the surrounding area and casts lights in a bewildering manner that obscures movement.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +20 %.
Adaptive_Lighting.name: Adaptive Lighting

Adi_Valente_Issue_1.description:
An original copy of the first issue of Adi Valente, the comic her father made while Adriana was a child.
  • Reduces the Success Zone size of Skill Checks for Claw-Trapped Survivors by -20 %.
Adi_Valente_Issue_1.name: Adi Valente Issue 1

Advanced_Movement_Prediction.description:
Even after they leave the zone of influenced, a refined AI programme predicts with high accuracy where a person will go next.
  • The Auras of newly Claw-Trapped Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
Advanced_Movement_Prediction.name: Advanced Movement Prediction

Brown_Noise_Generator.description:
An ominous hum disseminates from the Drone, blanketing the soundscape and making it difficult to hear anything else.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
Brown_Noise_Generator.name: Brown Noise Generator

Expired_Batteries.description:
The batteries on these Claw Traps have been swapped out with old alkaline batteries.
Recharging is not recommended.
  • All Survivors start the Trial with a Claw Trap.
  • The first Claw Trap has a reduced Battery Life of 50 %.
  • The second Claw Trap has a restored Battery Life of 100 %.
  • Increases the Battery Life by a stack-able +10 % for each successive Claw Trap a Survivor receives, up to a maximum duration of 150 %.
Expired_Batteries.name: Expired Batteries

Geographical_Readout.description:
The Drones generate and communicate a detailed three-dimensional map of the terrain, making traversal easier.
  • Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +20 % for 8 seconds after deploying a Drone.
Geographical_Readout.name: Geographical Readout

High-Current_Upgrade.description:
A wider cable with low resistance that allows faster recharging of batteries.
  • Increases the Tracking duration of the Radar by +1 second.
High-Current_Upgrade.name: High-Current Upgrade

High-Power_Floodlight.description:
A sudden and overwhelming light that discombobulates anyone foolish enough to approach.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
High-Power_Floodlight.name: High-Power Floodlight

Infrared_Upgrade.description:
Heat-detecting cameras focus in on high-stress individuals with pinpoint accuracy.
  • The Auras of Claw-Trapped Survivors are revealed to you for 4 seconds after they remove their Claw-Trap.
Infrared_Upgrade.name: Infrared Upgrade

Iridescent_Unpublished_Manuscript.description:
Before he disappeared, Adriana's father had started a newer, darker manga: Sonhadores Sombrios.

Whenever a Drone enters the Disabled State, the following effects apply for 15 seconds:

  • Causes the disabled Drone to emit a fake Terror Radius of 32 metres.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect.
"When evil is on the loose, it cannot escape from Adi Valente!" — Quote on the cover of Adi Valente #1
Iridescent_Unpublished_Manuscript.name: Iridescent Unpublished Manuscript

Loose_Screw.description:
A bone-chilling rattling emanates from the Drone, and it seems like it may fall at any moment, distracting Survivors from complicated tasks.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 6 seconds.
Loose_Screw.name: Loose Screw

Low-Power_Mode.description:
By intermittently powering on and off non-vital components, the Drone can stay on for longer.
  • Reduces the Rotational speed of the Scan Lines of Drones by -100 %.
Low-Power_Mode.name: Low-Power Mode

Powdered_Glass.description:
Once used on the strings used for battle kites, this powdered glass took on a much more nefarious purpose on her blade.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds, when hit with a Basic Attack.
Powdered_Glass.name: Powdered Glass

Prototype_Rotor.description:
The cutting-edge design allows the Drone to move with razor-sharp precision.
  • Increases the Rotational speed of the Scan Lines of Drones by +10 %.
Prototype_Rotor.name: Prototype Rotor

Randomised_Strobes.description:
Lights flash randomly on the ground, making it harder to find purchase on the uneven terrain.
  • Extends the duration of the Hindered Status Effect for Claw-Trapped Survivors when detected by Drones by +1 second.
Randomised_Strobes.name: Randomised Strobes

Shotgun_Speakers.description:
Capable of directing high-frequency noises in a single direction over great distances, the Drones can focus in on one individual and distract them from danger for some time.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors no longer receive a warning sound of impending Skill Checks.
Shotgun_Speakers.name: Shotgun Speakers

Stereo_Remote_Mic.description:
An upgrade that allows increased three-dimensional audio tracking.
  • Reduces the duration of the Disabled State of Drones to 85 % of its default value.
Stereo_Remote_Mic.name: Stereo Remote Mic

Supercharge.description:
The batteries may run a little hot, but removing the safety protocols from the cells makes them last a little longer.
  • Extends the Battery life of Claw Traps by +15 %.
Supercharge.name: Supercharge

Ultrasonic_Speaker.description:
A high-frequency noise blaster that fills the sonic spectrum with disorienting sounds, making it impossible for observers to pick out more important noises.
  • Reduces the duration of the immunity to consecutive Scan-Line Hits for Survivors to 90 % of its default value.
Ultrasonic_Speaker.name: Ultrasonic Speaker

Vital_Targeting_Processor.description:
An additional process in the Drone's programming more accurately predicts the weaknesses of potential prey.
  • Increases the strength of the Hindered Status Effect for Claw-Trapped Survivors when detected by Drones by -2 %.
Vital_Targeting_Processor.name: Vital Targeting Processor

Dried_Cherry_Blossom.description:
A crumbling, dried cherry flower.
Once the symbol of mortality.
  • Coming within 3 metres of a Survivor during a Phase-Walk triggers Killer Instinct.
  • Scratch Marks are no longer visible to you during a Phase-Walk.
Dried_Cherry_Blossom.name: Dried Cherry Blossom

Furin.description:
A warm summer breeze chimes the little bell hanging from the balcony ceiling.
  • Causes all Survivors to hear the audio cue of the Phase-Walk.
Furin.name: Furin

Gifted_Bamboo_Comb.description:
A narrow tooth bamboo comb to gently untangle dishevelled hair.
  • Increases the Charge speed of Yamaoka's Haunting by +15 %.
Gifted_Bamboo_Comb.name: Gifted Bamboo Comb

Juniper_Bonsai.description:
Dark blue-green foliage bonsai tree.
Once the symbol of Yamaoka family tradition.
  • Reduces the Cool-down of your Passive Phasing by -1 second.
  • Increases the Duration of your Passive Phasing by +50 %.
Juniper_Bonsai.name: Juniper Bonsai

Kaiun_Talisman.description:
A talisman to get luck on your side.
  • Increases the Duration of a Phase-Walk by +1 second.
Kaiun_Talisman.name: Kaiun Talisman

Katana_Tsuba.description:
The hand-guard of an ancestral blade.
Crafted for the Yamaoka family.
  • Extends the Invisibility duration while reappearing from a Phase-Walk by +0.2 seconds.
  • Increases your Movement speed while reappearing from a Phase-Walk by +5 %.
Katana_Tsuba.name: Katana Tsuba

Kintsugi_Teacup.description:
A cup mended and lacquered with powdered gold.
Both the breakage and repair are part the cup.
  • Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after breaking a Breakable Wall or a Pallet.
Kintsugi_Teacup.name: Kintsugi Teacup

Mother's_Glasses.description:
A pair of glasses belonging to a loving mother afflicted with a chronic disease.
  • Survivors coming within 2 metres of the Husk during a Phase-Walk triggers Killer Instinct.
Mother's_Glasses.name: Mother's Glasses

Mother-Daughter_Ring.description:
A silver ring engraved with "for my precious daughter".
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Phase-Walk by +25 %.
  • Scratch Marks are no longer visible to you during a Phase-Walk.
Mother-Daughter_Ring.name: Mother-Daughter Ring

Muddy_Sports_Day_Cap.description:
A muddy sport cap with a High School logo.
Identified with a sewn name tag to "Rin".
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Phase-Walk by +10 %.
Muddy_Sports_Day_Cap.name: Muddy Sports Day Cap

Origami_Crane.description:
One of the one thousand Orizuru for your wish to come true.
  • Increases the Recharge rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +20 %.
Origami_Crane.name: Origami Crane

Rin's_Broken_Watch.description:
A wristwatch with a shattered glass.
The name "Rin" is scribbled on the wristband.
  • Increases the Recharge rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +30 %.
Rin's_Broken_Watch.name: Rin's Broken Watch

Rusty_Flute.description:
A rusty transverse flute with a haunting sound.
  • Increases the Recharge rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +40 %.
Rusty_Flute.name: Rusty Flute

Senko_Hanabi.description:
Thin sparklers that light up summer nights and display the beauty of ephemeral moments in life.
  • Causes the Husk to explode after ending a Phase-Walk, blocking all Vault locations within 4 metres of its location for 5 seconds.
Senko_Hanabi.name: Senko Hanabi

Shiawase_Amulet.description:
A talisman that makes one happy and enthusiastic.
  • Increases the Duration of a Phase-Walk by +0.5 seconds.
Shiawase_Amulet.name: Shiawase Amulet

Uchiwa.description:
A handheld fan with a koi motif to create a nice breeze on a hot summer day.
  • Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after being stunned by a Pallet.
Uchiwa.name: Uchiwa

Wakizashi_Saya.description:
The scabbard of an ancestral blade.
Once crafted for the Yamaoka family.
  • Press the Active Ability button during a Phase-Walk to instantly reappear at the location of the Husk.
Wakizashi_Saya.name: Wakizashi Saya

White_Hair_Ribbon.description:
A silken bow to tame wild hair.
  • Increases the Charge speed of Yamaoka's Haunting by +20 %.
White_Hair_Ribbon.name: White Hair Ribbon

Yakuyoke_Amulet.description:
A powerful talisman to protect your endeavours from being hindered by suspicious circumstances.
  • Increases the Duration of a Phase-Walk by +3.5 seconds.
  • Reduces your Movement speed during a Phase-Walk by -15 %.
Yakuyoke_Amulet.name: Yakuyoke Amulet

Z\u014dri.description:
A comfortable pair of flat sandals that can easily be slipped on and off.
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Phase-Walk by +5 %.
Z\u014dri.name: Zōri

4-Coil_Spring_Kit.description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system to four coil springs, adding a great amount of strength to the Bear Traps hold.
  • Increases the Disarm time of the Bear Trap by +33 %.
4-Coil_Spring_Kit.name: 4-Coil Spring Kit

Bear_Oil.description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Traps squeaky joints.
  • Setting a Bear Trap is silent.
Bear_Oil.name: Bear Oil

Bloody_Coil.description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the Bear Traps spring more dangerous.
  • When a healthy Survivor disarms a Bear Trap, the Bloody Coil exacts its price, putting the Survivor into the Injured State.
Bloody_Coil.name: Bloody Coil

Coffee_Grounds.description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grounds.
  • Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect after setting a Bear Trap by +5 % .
Coffee_Grounds.name: Coffee Grounds

Fastening_Tools.description:
A specialised set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.
  • Increases the Rescue and Escape times from the Bear Trap by +25 %.
  • Increases the Setting speed of the Bear Trap by +50 %.
Fastening_Tools.name: Fastening Tools

Honing_Stone.description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the stone sharpens its blades.

The razor-sharp blades inflict deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.

  • Survivors caught in a Bear Trap, who free themselves, are inflicted with the Dying State.
Honing_Stone.name: Honing Stone

Iridescent_Stone.description:
Bear Traps sharpened with the sickly gleaming stone seem to gain a life of their own.
  • Automatically resets and arms a random disarmed Bear Trap every 30 seconds.
Iridescent_Stone.name: Iridescent Stone

Lengthened_Jaws.description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Traps.
  • Survivors who escape from Bear Traps suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.
Lengthened_Jaws.name: Lengthened Jaws

Makeshift_Wrap.description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.
  • You are no longer caught in your own Bear Traps, they are automatically disarmed instead.
Makeshift_Wrap.name: Makeshift Wrap

Oily_Coil.description:
A clear oil that makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more hazardous.
  • Resetting a Bear Trap reveals the Aura of the last Survivor to have disarmed it for 5 seconds.
Oily_Coil.name: Oily Coil

Padded_Jaws.description:
These padded jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound.
  • Bear Traps immobilise Survivors without damaging them.
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for trapping Survivors.
Padded_Jaws.name: Padded Jaws

Rusted_Jaws.description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots, making injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.
Rusted_Jaws.name: Rusted Jaws

Secondary_Coil.description:
A secondary coil keeps the Bear Trap functional in times when the primary coil becomes unusable.
  • Increases the Disarm time of the Bear Trap by +50 %.
Secondary_Coil.name: Secondary Coil

Serrated_Jaws.description:
These replacement trap jaws have saw-like blades, causing awful open wounds when they snap.
  • Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.

"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."
Serrated_Jaws.name: Serrated Jaws

Tar_Bottle.description:
A black, matte and sticky substance that when applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.
  • Darkens the Bear Trap.
Tar_Bottle.name: Tar Bottle

Tension_Spring.description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.
  • Automatically resets the Bear Trap 2 seconds after a Survivor escaped from it.
Tension_Spring.name: Tension Spring

Trapper_Bag.description:
A cured leather waist bag.
Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.
  • Increases the number of carried Bear Traps by +1.
Trapper_Bag.name: Trapper Bag

Trapper_Gloves.description:
Protective padded leather gloves.
  • Increases the Setting speed of the Bear Trap by +30 %.
Trapper_Gloves.name: Trapper Gloves

Trapper_Sack.description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.
  • Causes all Bear Traps to be carried in your inventory at the beginning of the Trial.
  • You can no longer pick up any placed Bear Traps, only reset them.
Trapper_Sack.name: Trapper Sack

Wax_Brick.description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.
  • Increases the Rescue and Escape times of the Bear Trap by +33 %.
Wax_Brick.name: Wax Brick

Bloody_Boa.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck.
A number of pockets are concealed within it.
  • Increases the number of carried Blades by +8.
Bloody_Boa.name: Bloody Boa

Caged_Heart_Shoes.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart.
Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
  • Increases your Movement speed in the Throw State by +0.1 m/s.
Caged_Heart_Shoes.name: Caged Heart Shoes

Cut_Thru_U_Single.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks.
Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
  • Causes Blades to pierce through the first Survivor they hit and continue travelling.
    • Any second Survivor hit only receives 0.5 Charges to their Laceration Meter.

"Can't stop this love
That's tearing your heart
Wherever you go
I will cut you apart" — NO SPIN's "Cut Thru U"
Cut_Thru_U_Single.name: Cut Thru U Single

Death_Throes_Compilation.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record.
Terrifying and emotionally raw.
  • The Auras of Survivors hit during Main Event are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

"Please, no... don't make it hurt... I can't... I..." — Unidentified Voice
Death_Throes_Compilation.name: Death Throes Compilation

Diamond_Cufflinks.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon.
Rubbing off the blood, there is so much to be seen in the glitter.
  • The Auras of Survivors one hit away from maximum Laceration are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

"Shhh... you don't have to see your blood anymore." — Ji-Woon Hak
Diamond_Cufflinks.name: Diamond Cufflinks

Edge_of_Revival_Album.description:
The Trickster's debut album.
The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
  • Causes Blades to shatter when hitting the environment, adding +0.5 Charges to the Laceration Meter of nearby Survivors.

"Your whisper on me
Warm as can be
Burning each breath
Till I can't breathe" — The Trickster's "Whispers of Warmth"
Edge_of_Revival_Album.name: Edge of Revival Album

Fizz-Spin_Soda.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN.
High sugar and caffeine content.
  • Increases the time before a Combo ends during Main Event by +15 %.
Fizz-Spin_Soda.name: Fizz-Spin Soda

Inferno_Wires.description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members.
Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
  • Extends the duration of Main Event by +40 %.
Inferno_Wires.name: Inferno Wires

Iridescent_Photocard.description:
A glass-like photo moulded from The Fog itself.
Ji Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
  • Grants a stack-able +1 % Haste Status Effect, up to a maximum of +7 %, for each consecutive Blade Hit.
    • This effect is lost when missing a Blade or damaging a Survivor.

"It's okay, scream my name. Let me hear everything the pain awakens..." — Ji-Woon Hak
Iridescent_Photocard.name: Iridescent Photocard

Ji-Woon's_Autograph.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster.
Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
  • Increases the time before a Combo ends during Main Event by +10 %.
Ji-Woon's_Autograph.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph

Killing_Part_Chords.description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for.
Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
  • Increases your Movement speed in the Throw State by +0.04 m/s.
Killing_Part_Chords.name: Killing Part Chords

Lucky_Blade.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned.
Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
  • Increases the duration of Main Event by +0.3 seconds for each successful Blade Hit.
Lucky_Blade.name: Lucky Blade

Melodious_Murder.description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up.
Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
  • Reduces the Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.
Melodious_Murder.name: Melodious Murder

Memento_Blades.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse.
Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
  • Increases the Throw rate of Blades by +10 %.
Memento_Blades.name: Memento Blades

On_Target_Single.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame.
Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
  • Increases the Decay delay of the Laceration Meter by +2 seconds.
On_Target_Single.name: On Target Single

Ripper_Brace.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper.
Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
  • Increases the Decay delay of the Laceration Meter by +3 seconds.
Ripper_Brace.name: Ripper Brace

Tequila_Moonrock.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar.
Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
  • Increases the duration of Main Event by +60 %.
Tequila_Moonrock.name: Tequila Moonrock

Trick_Blades.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination.
A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
  • Causes Blades to ricochet off the environment a total of two times.
Trick_Blades.name: Trick Blades

Trick_Pouch.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets.
Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
  • Increases the number of carried Blades by +4.
Trick_Pouch.name: Trick Pouch

Waiting_For_You_Watch.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You.
It is a stage prop that does not work and never will.
  • Increases the duration of Main Event by +0.4 seconds for each successful Blade Hit.

"Don't run away
Don't say we're through
No way to escape thisI'll be waiting for you" — NO SPIN'S "Waiting For You"
Waiting_For_You_Watch.name: Waiting For You Watch

Baby_Teeth.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago.
They are unusually sharp.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds after removing Victor.
Baby_Teeth.name: Baby Teeth

Bloody_Black_Hood.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte.
Soon, he became the prey.
  • Reduces the Transition time when switching back to Charlotte by -0.5 seconds.
Bloody_Black_Hood.name: Bloody Black Hood

Cat's_Eye.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family.
Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
  • Suppresses all noise made by Victor while holding a Pounce.
Cat's_Eye.name: Cat's Eye

Cat_Figurine.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye.
He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
  • Unlocks the ability to see the Target location of a Pounce.
Cat_Figurine.name: Cat Figurine

Ceremonial_Candelabrum.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn.
A symbol of his tenacity.
  • Increases the Crushing time of Victor by +0.2 seconds when controlling Charlotte.
Ceremonial_Candelabrum.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum

Drop_of_Perfume.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with.
It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
  • Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect within Victor's Shriek range when controlling Charlotte.

"Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men's hearts." — A History of Witches and Demons, 1602
Drop_of_Perfume.name: Drop of Perfume

Forest_Stew.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
  • Increases your Movement speed when controlling Victor by +0.6 m/s.

"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." — Madeleine Deshayes
Forest_Stew.name: Forest Stew

Iridescent_Pendant.description:
A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself.
There is a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
  • Crushing Victor while Charlotte is in control causes the Survivor to suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 45 seconds.

"Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." — Madeleine Deshayes
Iridescent_Pendant.name: Iridescent Pendant

Madeleine's_Glove.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother.
During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
  • Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +4 metres.
Madeleine's_Glove.name: Madeleine's Glove

Madeleine's_Scarf.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death.
The Twins kept it as a memento.
  • Increases your Movement speed when controlling Victor by +0.3 m/s.

"...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." — Inquiry into the Death of Madeleine Deshayes
Madeleine's_Scarf.name: Madeleine's Scarf

Rusted_Needle.description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
  • Removing a latched-on Victor causes the Survivor to suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.
Rusted_Needle.name: Rusted Needle

Sewer_Sludge.description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
  • Increases the time required to remove a latched-on Victor by +2 seconds.
Sewer_Sludge.name: Sewer Sludge

Silencing_Cloth.description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth.
Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
  • After waking from her Dormant State, Charlotte is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.

"I don't like this game anymore, Mother..." — Charlotte Deshayes
Silencing_Cloth.name: Silencing Cloth

Soured_Milk.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured.
Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
  • Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +2 metres.
Soured_Milk.name: Soured Milk

Spinning_Top.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.
He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
  • Causes Survivors hit with a Pounce to drop any carried Item.

"Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes
Spinning_Top.name: Spinning Top

Stale_Biscuit.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town's market.
It was not much, but it was better than most meals.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of a Pounce by -0.4 seconds.
Stale_Biscuit.name: Stale Biscuit

Tiny_Fingernail.description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor's death.
As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
  • Reduces the Unbinding time of Victor by -0.25 seconds.
Tiny_Fingernail.name: Tiny Fingernail

Toy_Sword.description:
A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long.
Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
  • Reduces the Charge time of a Pounce by -0.1 second.
Toy_Sword.name: Toy Sword

Victor's_Soldier.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.
Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds after crushing Victor when controlling Charlotte.

"Kch--kch—k'ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes
Victor's_Soldier.name: Victor's Soldier

Weighty_Rattle.description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.
It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
  • Removing a latched-on Victor causes the Survivor to suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 20 seconds.
Weighty_Rattle.name: Weighty Rattle

B-Movie_Poster.description:
The movie was rumored to be state-funded propaganda, made specifically for something called Project Apple-Pie.
  • Survivors damaged by UVX suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 30 seconds.
B-Movie_Poster.name: B-Movie Poster

Blurry_Photo.description:
The photo was found at an abandoned campsite.
The campers were never seen again.
  • After Teleporting, your full Movement speed is recovered faster by +50 %.
Blurry_Photo.name: Blurry Photo

Captured_by_the_Dark.description:
The documentary purported that the disappearances were linked to small-town cinemas.
Audiences left the theater feeling uneasy.
  • Causes all Survivors to start the Trial in the Weakened State.
  • Reduces the maximum number of co-existing Hallucinations in the environment by -1.
Captured_by_the_Dark.name: Captured by the Dark

Device_of_Undisclosed_Origin.description:
Was the thing made on Earth? Or somewhere else entirely?
  • Survivors entering the Aura range of a Hallucination suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
Device_of_Undisclosed_Origin.name: Device of Undisclosed Origin

Discarded_Milk_Carton.description:
She decided to take the long way home, and waved goodbye to her friends before parting ways.
  • Doubles the Bounce strength of UVX Projectiles:
    • Increases the Bounciness by +8 %.
    • Reduces the Friction by -15 %.
Discarded_Milk_Carton.name: Discarded Milk Carton

Footprint_Cast.description:
The cast sits in the Museum of the Weird in Sarasota, Florida and has long since been debunked.
  • Reduces the Spawn timer of your next Hallucination by -15 seconds, when a Survivor becomes Weakened.
Footprint_Cast.name: Footprint Cast

Front-Page_Article.description:
The assailant had torn gaping holes in the walls of the cabin, and drove the family into the woods.
  • Reduces the Spawn timer of your next Hallucination by -50 %, after breaking a Breakable Wall or a Pallet.
Front-Page_Article.name: Front-Page Article

Homemade_Mask.description:
The killer had made the mask in the shed in his backyard, where he would bring the others when the sun went down.
  • Survivors successfully performing the Dispel interaction on a Hallucination suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Homemade_Mask.name: Homemade Mask

Hypnotist's_Watch.description:
Hypnotherapy was recommended to recover repressed memories.
What emerged from his mind would be his undoing.
  • Survivors hit by an airborne UVX Projectile suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 10 seconds.
Hypnotist's_Watch.name: Hypnotist's Watch

Iridescent_OSS_Report.description:
The report was redacted to the point of being meaningless.
But still, theorists tried to extract meaning from it.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of the Teleport ability by -5 seconds.
  • Increases the lifetime of the Decoy by +10 seconds.
  • Imbues Decoys with a Terror Radius and a Red Stain.
Iridescent_OSS_Report.name: Iridescent OSS Report

Last_Known_Recording.description:
She studied Musique Concrète before she disappeared, her screams the last sound on the tape.
  • Reduces the Aura range of Hallucinations by -25 %.
Last_Known_Recording.name: Last Known Recording

Notebook_of_Theories.description:
His studio apartment was empty and reeked of black mould.
The book was the only thing left.
  • Increases the duration of the Hindered Status Effect for Survivors hit with an airborne UVX Projectile by +2 seconds.
Notebook_of_Theories.name: Notebook of Theories

Obscure_Game_Cartridge.description:
Some maintained Project Apple-Pie evolved over time, turning to new forms of media for results.
  • Increases the Action speeds for the following interactions by +30 % for 20 seconds after Teleporting:
    • Breaking Breakable Walls.
    • Breaking Pallets.
    • Damaging Generators.
    • Vaulting Windows.
Obscure_Game_Cartridge.name: Obscure Game Cartridge

Punctured_Eyeball.description:
The station was a scene of madness.
The officers had seemingly turned on each other.
  • Survivors successfully performing the Dispel interaction on a Hallucination, while they are both in the Injured State and the Weakened State, suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.
Punctured_Eyeball.name: Punctured Eyeball

Rabbit's_Foot.description:
The unlucky creature's remains were found by a tree, its intestines wedged between its teeth.
  • While charging UVX, Pools of Blood appear to you in bright red.
  • Survivors damaged by UVX suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 30 seconds.
Rabbit's_Foot.name: Rabbit's Foot

Serum_Vial.description:
The molecular structure of the substance was synthesised in the lab, but its effects could never be replicated.
  • Survivors entering the Aura range of a Hallucination suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 10 seconds.
Serum_Vial.name: Serum Vial

Sketch_Attempt.description:
The victim’s child was given paper and crayons at the station, while he waited for his father to pick him up.
  • Survivors hit by UVX's Blast Area suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 20 seconds.
Sketch_Attempt.name: Sketch Attempt

Slashed_Backpack.description:
When the hiker was rescued from the mountain pass, she insisted her companion would never wander off alone.
  • Hitting a Hallucination with an UVX Projectile triggers a Blast Area around it and destroying the Hallucination.
  • Reduces the Spawn timer of your next Hallucination by -75 % after destroying the previous one this way.
Slashed_Backpack.name: Slashed Backpack

Vanishing_Box.description:
The magician was popular at children's parties, and quickly became the top suspect.
  • Survivors completing a Generator become Weakened.
Vanishing_Box.name: Vanishing Box

Victim's_Map.description:
He thought the key to solving the mystery lay beyond the forest, and feared he would never return.
  • Survivors successfully performing the Stare Down The Unknown interaction trigger Killer Instinct for 3 seconds.
Victim's_Map.name: Victim's Map

\"All_Seeing\"_-_Blood.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.

Unlocks hidden potential in your Aura-reading ability:

  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you within 8 metres of your location when Cloaked.
\"All_Seeing\"_-_Blood.name: "All Seeing" - Blood

\"All_Seeing\"_-_Spirit.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, ominously glows on the head of the Bell.

Unlocks hidden potential in your Aura-reading ability:

  • Reveals the Repair progression of Generators via the intensity of their Aura when Cloaked.
\"All_Seeing\"_-_Spirit.name: "All Seeing" - Spirit

\"Blind_Warrior\"_-_Mud.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
\"Blind_Warrior\"_-_Mud.name: "Blind Warrior" - Mud

\"Blind_Warrior\"_-_White.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds.
\"Blind_Warrior\"_-_White.name: "Blind Warrior" - White

\"Blink\"_-_Mud.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces the Cloaking time by -40 %.
\"Blink\"_-_Mud.name: "Blink" - Mud

\"Blink\"_-_White.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces the Cloaking time by -60 %.
\"Blink\"_-_White.name: "Blink" - White

\"Shadow_Dance\"_-_Blood.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +60 % when Cloaked.
\"Shadow_Dance\"_-_Blood.name: "Shadow Dance" - Blood

\"Shadow_Dance\"_-_White.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +40 % while Cloaked.
\"Shadow_Dance\"_-_White.name: "Shadow Dance" - White

\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_Blood.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces the Uncloaking time by -12 %.
\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_Blood.name: "Swift Hunt" - Blood

\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_Mud.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces the Uncloaking time by -8 %.
\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_Mud.name: "Swift Hunt" - Mud

\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_White.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Reduces the Uncloaking time by -10 %.
\"Swift_Hunt\"_-_White.name: "Swift Hunt" - White

\"The_Beast\"_-_Soot.description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the Realm of Fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
  • Your Terror Radius is no longer suppressed when Cloaked.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Stalking and Surprise Attack Score Events.
\"The_Beast\"_-_Soot.name: "The Beast" - Soot

\"The_Ghost\"_-_Soot.description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the Spirit World, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
  • Your Terror Radius and Red Stain are suppressed for another 6 seconds after uncloaking.
\"The_Ghost\"_-_Soot.name: "The Ghost" - Soot

\"The_Hound\"_-_Soot.description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
  • When Cloaked, Pools of Blood appear to you in bright red.
\"The_Hound\"_-_Soot.name: "The Hound" - Soot

\"The_Serpent\"_-_Soot.description:
The Laokeye symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
  • Breaking Breakable Walls or Pallets by any means, or performing the Damage Generator action on incomplete Generators, will cause you to automatically uncloak.
\"The_Serpent\"_-_Soot.name: "The Serpent" - Soot

\"Windstorm\"_-_Blood.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases your Movement Speed by +9 % when Cloaked.
\"Windstorm\"_-_Blood.name: "Windstorm" - Blood

\"Windstorm\"_-_Mud.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases your Movement Speed by +5 % when Cloaked.
\"Windstorm\"_-_Mud.name: "Windstorm" - Mud

\"Windstorm\"_-_White.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
  • Increases your Movement Speed by +7 % when Cloaked.
\"Windstorm\"_-_White.name: "Windstorm" - White

Bone_Clapper.description:
A Bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone.
Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.
  • Survivors are unable to discern the distance and direction of the Wailing Bell.
Bone_Clapper.name: Bone Clapper

Coxcombed_Clapper.description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound.
A malevolent Aura emanates from it.
  • Silences the Wailing Bell.
Coxcombed_Clapper.name: Coxcombed Clapper

Acidic_Blood.description:
When damaged, The Xenomorph's unique physiology made it deadlier than ever.

When Survivors stun you within 20 seconds after emerging from the Tunnels and while you are in Crawler Mode, the following effects apply:

  • Causes healthy Survivors to lose 1 Health State.
  • Causes injured Survivors to suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.
"I think we oughta discuss the bonus situation." — Parker
Acidic_Blood.name: Acidic Blood

Ash's_Innards.description:
While hardier, mechanical beings break too when enough force is applied.
  • Increases the Respawn timer of Remote Flame Turrets by +10 seconds.
Ash's_Innards.name: Ash's Innards

Brett's_Cap.description:
This Nostromo ballcap was fashionable, but severely limited his vertical field of vision.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 25 seconds, when they were within 16 metres of a Remote Flame Turret that was destroyed by any means.
Brett's_Cap.name: Brett's Cap

Cat_Carrier.description:
Saving the cat is a noble goal.
It's also very distracting.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 30 seconds, when a Remote Flame Turret knocks you out of Crawler Mode.
Cat_Carrier.name: Cat Carrier

Cereal_Rations.description:
Contains 100 % of the recommended daily intake of Vitamin A.
Tastes awful.
  • The Auras of deployed Remote Flame Turrets are revealed to you while inside the Tunnels.
    • This effect lingers for 3 seconds after emerging from the Tunnels.
Cereal_Rations.name: Cereal Rations

Crew_Headset.description:
While they facilitated team communication, the constant chatter made the crew easier to track.
  • Increases the Detection range of Survivor Footsteps when inside the Tunnels by +6 metres.
Crew_Headset.name: Crew Headset

Drinking_Bird.description:
One of the many tchotchkes littering the Nostromo's living quarters.
A bit of whimsy in an otherwise sterile environment.
  • Increases the Duration of Killer Instinct after exiting the Tunnels by +2 seconds.
Drinking_Bird.name: Drinking Bird

Emergency_Helmet.description:
An extra helmet on the bridge, for use in emergencies only.
  • Increases the Resistance towards Remote Flame Turrets before being knocked out of Crawler Mode by +35 %.
Emergency_Helmet.name: Emergency Helmet

Harpoon_Gun.description:
Barely a weapon, its use is only viable in a situation of last resort.
  • Successfully hitting a Survivor within 10 seconds after exiting the Tunnels causes all other Survivors farther than 24 metres from your location to scream and reveal their location to you.
Harpoon_Gun.name: Harpoon Gun

Improvised_Cattle_Prod.description:
A brutal and noisy weapon, which might have been more effective against a cow.

Each time a Generator is completed, the following effect applies for 15 seconds:

  • The Auras of Survivors coming within 10 metres of a Control Station are revealed to you for 15 seconds.
Improvised_Cattle_Prod.name: Improvised Cattle Prod

Kane's_Helmet.description:
A thin layer of glass was the difference between a minor inconvenience and the tragic destruction of the Nostromo's crew.
  • Survivors hit with a successful Tail Attack suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.
Kane's_Helmet.name: Kane's Helmet

Lambert's_Star_Map.description:
Vital for interstellar travel, but not as useful on a smaller scale.
  • Reduces the Flame-throwing range of Remote Flame Turrets by -2 metres.
Lambert's_Star_Map.name: Lambert's Star Map

Light_Wand.description:
A portable light source used by Ash and Dallas while looking for the invasive creature.
Mostly ineffective for lighting larger spaces.
  • Increases the Downtime duration of Remote Flame Turrets after exiting the Tunnels by +1 second.
Light_Wand.name: Light Wand

Moulted_Skin.description:
The Xenomorph moulted many times as it rapidly grew on the Nostromo.
Its shed skin was a constant reminder of its presence.
  • After deploying a Remote Flame Turret, Survivors suffer from a -3 % Hindered Status Effect and the Exhausted Status Effect for 3 seconds.
Moulted_Skin.name: Moulted Skin

Multipurpose_Hatchet.description:
Equally useful for destruction and repair.
  • Survivors hit with a successful Tail Attack suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.
Multipurpose_Hatchet.name: Multipurpose Hatchet

Ovomorph.description:
It looks harmless, but the horrors held inside are immeasurable.
  • Increases the Recovery speed of Crawler Mode when outside of the Tunnels by +25 %.
Ovomorph.name: Ovomorph

Parker's_Headband.description:
A bold fashion choice that doubled as a handy way to wick sweat from the eyes.
  • Grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect for 3 seconds after exiting the Tunnels.
Parker's_Headband.name: Parker's Headband

Ripley's_Watch.description:
On a ship as massive as the Nostromo, synchronising watches was important to keep track of work shifts.
  • Causes the Remote Flame Turret to self-destruct after knocking you out of Crawler Mode.
Ripley's_Watch.name: Ripley's Watch

Self-Destruct_Bolt.description:
They needed to be removed to start, and replaced to end, the self-destruct sequence.
Just seeing them evokes a sense of urgency.
  • Increases the Vaulting speed while in Crawler Mode by +30 %.
Self-Destruct_Bolt.name: Self-Destruct Bolt

Semiotic_Keyboard.description:
Its symbols are designed to be universally recognisable, but they may take some getting used to.
  • Reveals the Repair progression of Generators located within 16 metres of a Remote Flame Turret via the intensity of their Aura.
Semiotic_Keyboard.name: Semiotic Keyboard
